But that notion is much too mundane for Julian Barbour . According to the 64 - NN - old British physicist , there 's no point in trying to describe NN , because it simply does n't exist . " The passage of NN , " he VBZ , " is simply an illusion created by our brains . " This unconventional NN comes from an equally unconventional NN . The riddle of NN had fascinated him all along , and about 15 NNS ago he tackled it in earnest . Recalls Barbour : " I asked myself , ' How do you VB hold of NN ? It 's invisible ; you can't really VB your hands on it . So what is it really ? ' " There was n't any good answer . Although physicists work with NN all the NN ( as it were ) , they never define precisely what it is . Barbour RB knew that at least CD physicist , an American named Bryce DeWitt , had managed to meld general relativity and quantum mechanics into a single consistent NN - - a major goal of modern physics -- by removing NN from the equations . But that was generally considered a mathematical trick with no basis in reality . Barbour thought otherwise . The passage of NN is as illusory as the sense of movement created by the succession of still frames in a motion picture . text: Writer John Steinbeck was presented the U.S. Medal of Freedom on September 14 , 1964 . Steinbeck had already received numerous other honors and awards for his writing , including the 1962 Nobel Prize and a 1939 Pulitzer Prize for Grapes of Wrath . Steinbeck , a native Californian , studied writing intermittently at Stanford between 1920 and 1925 but never graduated . He moved to NNP York and worked as a manual laborer and journalist while writing his JJ CD novels , which were not successful . He married in 1930 and moved RB to California with his wife . His father , a NN official in Salinas County , gave the couple a house to live in while Steinbeck continued writing . His JJ novel , Tortilla NNP , about the comic antics of several rootless drifters who share a house in California , was published in 1935 . The novel became a financial success . Steinbeck ’s next works , In Dubious Battle and Of Mice and Men , were both successful , and in 1938 his masterpiece The Grapes of Wrath was published . The novel , about the struggles of an Oklahoma family who lose their farm and become fruit pickers in California , won a Pulitzer Prize in 1939 . After NNP War II , Steinbeck ’s work became more sentimental in such novels as Cannery Row and The Pearl . He RB wrote several successful films , including Forgotten Village ( 1941 ) and Viva Zapata ( 1952 ) . He became interested in marine biology and published a nonfiction book , The NNP of Cortez , in 1941 . His travel memoir , Travels with Charlie , describes his trek across the NNP NNPS in a camper . Steinbeck won the Nobel Prize in 1962 and died in NNP York in 1968 .

text: Shelter , fire , NN and food : The dos and don’ts of wilderness survival Preparedness is survival . When disaster strikes , you might find yourself stuck out in the wilderness , which can be treacherous and quite unforgiving , so knowing exactly what to do when venturing out can up your chances of making it out alive . ( h/t to RealitySurvival.com ) How to survive out in the wilderness Wilderness survival skills are an important part of any prepper ’s NN , and will be especially useful for those who live in an urban area and have absolutely no experience with the wilderness at all . Here are a few things to take note of to keep yourself alive out in the wild . Keep calm and use your head When out in the wild , you should anticipate that things can VB bad in no NN and prepare accordingly . However , 0ne thing you should not do when out in the wilderness is panic . Panic can influence your mindset and decision - making , and can VB you to make irrational choices . Instead , you should collect yourself and start thinking of the best course of action to VB you out of your current predicament . For example , you should n’t waste daylight standing around feeling anxious , yet accomplishing nothing . If you VBP to VB NN , VB about where the closest settlement is and start moving in the general direction before it gets dark . Bad weather is something difficult to avoid when trying to survive out in the wilderness . In this case , knowledge on building a shelter is vital to protect yourself from exposure to the harmful elements . Getting wet RB in mild temperatures can be a death sentence if you are n’t prepared . Your shelter will depend on the resources available around you . Build your shelter as small as possible to be inconspicuous to the other denizens of the wilderness . An example shelter is to use branches and leaves and arrange them against a sturdy structure as a makeshift “ roof . ” In any survival situation , finding NN should be CD of your priorities . An average person can survive about three days without drinking NN , which decreases if he ’s in a hotter NN . RB a few hours of dehydration can affect physical and mental capacity . However , you ca n’t just drink any NN you find . JJ NN sources are contaminated with bacteria and other pollutants that can be harmful to NN . A conventional NN to purify NN is by using a NN filter or purifier . You can RB boil the NN over a fire as an alternative . Keep a knife on you A knife is a versatile survival tool and can be used for a variety of purposes . From making shelters , hunting for food , to starting a fire , a knife will definitely come in handy when surviving out in the wilderness . However , a simple pocket knife MD n’t last RB . There are dedicated survival knives you can choose from that are much more durable . If you must hunker down for the night , knowing how to make a fire can make NN significantly easier . Not only can fire keep you warm and prevent problems IN hypothermia , you can RB use it to light up your immediate surroundings and cook food . CD of the easiest ways of having a fire ready at all times is by keeping some fire starter IN matches or a lighter on your person . However , do not use flammable liquids IN gasoline and lighter fluid , if you VBP to avoid unintentionally starting a forest fire . Learn more about living out in the wilderness at Survival . NN .

text: Between 542 and 66 million NNS ago — RB before the “ supervolcano ” became part of Yellowstone ’s geologic NN — the area was covered by inland seas . NPS / Jim Peaco Most of NNP ’s history ( from the formation of the NN 4.6 billion NNS ago to approximately 541 million NNS ago ) is VBN as the Precambrian NN . Rocks of this age are VBN in northern Yellowstone and in the hearts of the Teton , Beartooth , Wind River , and Gros Ventre ranges . During the Precambrian and the subsequent Paleozoic and Mesozoic eras ( 541 to 66 million NNS ago ) , the western NNP NNPS was covered at times by oceans , sand dunes , tidal flats , and vast plains . From the end of the Mesozoic through the early Cenozoic , mountain - building processes formed the Rocky Mountains . During the Cenozoic era ( approximately the last 66 million NNS of NNP ’s history ) , widespread mountain - building , volcanism , faulting , and glaciation sculpted the Yellowstone area . Magma ( molten rock from NNP ’s mantle ) has been close to the NN in Yellowstone for more than 2 million NNS . Its heat melted rocks in the crust , creating a magma chamber of partially molten , partially solid rock . Heat from this shallow magma caused an area of the upper crust to expand and rise . The Yellowstone Plateau became a geomorphic landform shaped by episodes of volcanic activity . Stress RB caused rocks overlying the magma to break , forming faults and causing earthquakes . Eventually , these faults reached the deep magma chamber . Magma oozed through these cracks , releasing pressure within the chamber and allowing trapped gases to expand rapidly . A massive volcanic eruption then occurred along vents , spewing volcanic ash and NN into the NN and causing fast super - hot debris ( pyroclastic ) flows on the ground . As the underground magma chamber emptied , the ground above it sunk , creating the JJ of Yellowstone ’s three calderas . This diagram shows the general ideas behind CD theories of how magma rises to the NN . Adapted with permission from Windows into the NNP by Robert Smith and Lee J. Siegel , 2000 . Based on minerals from the last major eruption , the researchers VBD that the NNS leading up to an eruption MD happen in a matter of decades rather than thousands of NNS in advance as previously thought . Supervolcanoes are characterized as volcanic centers that have had eruptions that covered more than 240 cubic miles . The US has CD : CD in Yellowstone and another in California ’s NNP Valley . An eruption MD emit ash that MD expand over 500 miles . The eruption MD likely cover the ground with as much as 4 inches of gray ash , which MD be detrimental to crops growing in the Midwest . Another less worrisome concern is the 1,000 degree F molten lava that MD ooze out . Gases , including sulfur dioxide , which contributes to acid rain MD be spewed from the supervolcano and the JJ cooling issues associated with reflecting sunlight away from the NNP are RB concerns . But there are other supervolcanos in the NN with sooner predictions than Yellowstone ’s . Campi Flegri , a name that aptly translates as “ burning fields , is in a “ critical NN , ” according to researchers in Italy . It consists of a vast and complex network of underground chambers that formed hundreds of thousands of NNS ago , stretching from the outskirts of Naples to underneath the Mediterranean NNP . Though its last eruption was in 1538 , it ’s due for an eruption soon . It MD be a minor event compared to the 72 cubic miles of molten rock it spewed in its most notorious eruption 39,000 NNS ago , called Campanian Ignimbrite , that likely contributed to the extinction of the Neanderthals . Fortune website article reported that if the Yellowstone supervolcano erupts , it MD shoot out more than 1,000 cubic kilometers of rock and ash into the air . That ’s 250 cubic miles . That ’s more than three times as JJ as the Campanian Ignimbrite eruption in Italy , which created a sulfurous cloud that floated more than 1,200 miles away to hang over Russia . That ’s 2,500 times more material than Mount St. Helens expelled in 1980 , killing 57 NNS . An eruption at Yellowstone MD result in a cloud of ash more than 500 miles wide , stretching across nearly the entire western NNP NNPS . NASA has a plan to neutralize supervolcano threats however . They VBP the most viable solution MD be to drill up to 6 miles down into the supervolcano , and pump down NN at high pressure . The circulating NN MD return at a temperature of around 662 F , thus slowly day by day extracting heat from the volcano . And while such a project MD come at an estimated cost of around $ 3.46 billion , it comes with an enticing catch which MD convince politicians to make the investment . It MD become a source of geothermal NN . But there are considerable risks , too . It MD trigger the eruption it ’s meant to save us from . Historically , four types of volcanic events have taken place in Yellowstone ( you MD click on each NN to learn more ) : 1 . Caldera Forming Eruptions — 2.1 and 1.3 million NNS ago 2 . Lava Flows — about 30 between 640,000 and 70,000 NNS ago 3 . Earthquakes — 1000 to 3000 yearly ; last notable quake was in 1959 4 . Hydrothermal ( Steam ) Explosions — small explosions in the 20th century ; a dozen or so major explosions between 14,000 and 3,000 NNS ago The likelihood of an eruption in the near future is still low . However those who instigate such a project will never VB it to completion , or RB have an idea whether it might be successful within their lifetime . Cooling Yellowstone in this manner MD happen at a rate of 3.2808399 NNS a NN , taking of the order of tens of thousands of NNS until just cold rock was left . text: While a majority of Americans are dancing in the streets over Donald J. NNP becoming their next NNP and “ Making America Great Again , ” there are those in the NNP movement and the Scientific community , that are expressing their concerns . Some concerns are justified , while other concerns that are being voiced raise a “ Red Flag . ” We have to wonder how much of these expressed concerns are paranoia from those of “ left leaning ” political views … those with “ Junk NNP ” in their portfolios ( CYA ) … and still others with an agenda that will not hold up under the light of day . Some JJ planners spend their careers mapping out worst - case scenarios . As of January 20 , they ’ve got CD in the White House . There ’s a case to be made that the NNP Administration ’s rollback of JJ regulation wo n’t be devastating ; that market forces will prevail in the coming NN revolution ; that the environment and public NN will continue to be protected under the EPA and other agencies , and that NN governments will do their part as well ; and that a newly - elected NNP , self - branded as an astute businessman and dealmaker , will be open to the wisdom of ensuring a safe and healthy America . But there are CD fatal flaws with this argument : 1 ) You were n’t born yesterday ; and 2 ) You do n’t come to this page to be lied to . The NNP Administration ’s cabinet nominees and transition staff are a wall - to - wall collection of zealots , ideologues and latter - day Robber Barons . Their collective message , both stated and implied , is that the American NN ’s ability to protect the environment , already besieged and underfunded , is on the brink of oblivion . In early December , the cavalcade of aspirants and celebrities seeking an audience at NNP Tower included CD high profile NN activists , former Vice NNP Al Gore and actor Leonardo DiCaprio . Gore ’s visit was brokered by the NNP Daughter - Elect , Ivanka NNP . The NNP Administration ’s cabinet nominees and transition staff are a wall - to - wall collection of zealots , ideologues and latter - day Robber Barons . Upon exiting , Gore VBD the press gaggle that meeting with the Trumps was “ extremely interesting . ” Combined with NNP ’s declaration to the NNP York Times that he had an “ open mind ” about NN NN , the wilted spirits of environmentalists were revived . Kudos to Gore and DiCaprio for making their case , but now , let ’s return to NN reality . He ’s not let them down , helping to lead a battle — against the agency he ’ll be in charge of if approved — on the Clean Power Plan , the Waters of the NNP NNPS definition ( WOTUS ) . WOTUS and the Clean NNP Act hold a particular irony , since the anticipated assaults on Section 404 of the Clean NNP Act MD make it easier to drain real , not metaphoric , swamps from coast to coast . A day after Gore ’s meeting , NNP announced the nomination of Oklahoma Attorney General Scott Pruitt ( Pictured left / Credit : Gage Skidmore / flickr ) to lead the NNP Protection Agency . In his six NNS on the job in Oklahoma , Pruitt has enjoyed the support of keystone local industries , including fossil fuel and poultry . NN : Next was ExxonMobil CEO Rex Tillerson , who vaulted past the likes of Rudy Guiliani and Gen. David Petraeus for the Secretary of NNP nomination . Months away from Exxon ’s mandatory 65 NN - old retirement age , Tillerson was a NN in search of a hobby . Tillerson has acknowledged that JJ - caused NN NN is real , and has endorsed both a NN tax and the Paris NN agreement . He ’s an Exxon lifer , with 41 NNS in the employ of a corporation that ’s buried its own NN affirming NN NN , and that still funds NN denial groups . But do n’t VB he ’s inexperienced in NN or foreign policy . Steve Coll ’s must - read 2012 book “ Private Empire ” makes the compelling case that Exxon functions as a sovereign petro-state , leveraging diplomatic pressure in virtually every corner of the NNP . All VBN , the CEO of Exxon looks to be the most progressive voice on NN NN in the NNP Administration . The CEO of Exxon . As Elizabeth Kolbert , the Pulitzer - winning NNP Yorker writer observed , “ You have to be pretty desperate – and at this point JJ NNS are – to take this as NN for optimism . ” Related : He ’s no Ronald Reagan DOE : Editorial cartoonists and late - night comics love Rick Perry , who , as its potential boss , probably now remembers that Department of NNP was CD of those agencies he ’d VB to abolish . The former Texas governor is actually a big fan of wind power , which he watched become a booming industry in his NN . “ You can be proud that Texas produces more NN from wind turbines than all but five NNS , ” he boasted upon leaving office in 2015 . He ruled over a bonanza in Texas fracking as well , and last NN joined the Board of Directors of NNP Transfer Partners , the builders of the Dakota Access Pipeline . Perry ( Pictured left / Credit : Gage Skidmore / flickr ) has RB VBN that NN NN is a NN to keep NN NNS as wealthy as we all VBP that they are . While DOE has been home to groundbreaking clean NN NN , the bulk of the department ’s mission and budget goes to maintaining the U.S. nuclear weapons stockpile , and cleaning up the immense messes left by their manufacture . Since leaving the Texas NNP House , Perry has kept himself busy with an unsuccessful appearance on “ Dancing With the Stars , ” and by turning RB a criminal indictment for abuse of power as Governor . Step lightly , Guv . Interior : Ryan Zinke ( Pictured below / Credit : Gage Skidmore / flickr ) is a JJ - term Montana congressman who accepts that NN NN is real . In the past , he ’s called NN NN a “ threat multiplier , ” but that Obama ’s NN strategies MD unleash “ catastrophic ” JJ costs . An avid hunter , Zinke VBZ he ’d VB to VB more intensive use of federal lands by both sportsmen and oil and NN drillers , and is expected to favor opening controversial export terminals to ship Montana and Wyoming coal across the Pacific . He does have credentials as a “ hook and bullet ” conservationist , including support for the crucial Land and NNP Conservation Fund . That ’s earned him opposition from western anti-environment groups IN the American Land Rights Association . He earned a 3 percent rating from the League of Conservation Voters in 2015 . Unlike JJ on the NNP team , he ’s voiced opposition for turning federal lands over to NNS . Rick Perry ruled over a bonanza in Texas fracking and last NN joined the Board of Directors of NNP Transfer Partners , the builders of the Dakota Access Pipeline . Justice : If approved , Alabama Senator Jeff Sessions MD serve as Attorney General . He ’s VBN that efforts to bring clean NN to developing nations MD be a veritable assault on the NN ’s poorest NNS . He believes CO2 is a benign “ plant food , ” and famously launched a bizarre interrogation of EPA Administrator Gina McCarthy earlier this NN . Enough about the NN / environment bosses . The secondary players MD be considerably worse . JJ of these items are taken from JJ - rate reporting by Lyndsey Gilpin of High Country NNP , and NN by Jenny Rowland and Erin Auel at the Center for American Progress . The CAP researchers documented that nearly every key member of the transition teams for EPA , Interior , and DOE worked for Koch - funded organizations or office - holders . NN : Thomas Pyle , a former lobbyist for both Koch Industries and the National Petrochemical and Refiners Association , leads the transition team . He currently runs the Koch - and Exxon - funded Institute for NNP NNP , a NN tank that ’s espoused a loosening of NN regulations and NN denial while denouncing wind NN . A special moment came on December 14 , when NNP transition team member Anthony Scaramucci appeared on CNN . Anthony Scaramucci , a financial CEO and Fox Business NNP contributor , mixed it up with CNN anchor Chris Cuomo in mid-December . Cuomo repeatedly asked his guest about whether NN NN is real . Citing NNP NNP NN , Scaramucci took a deep dive into the manufacture of doubt . Funny thing : Scaramucci was asked the same question six months ago and declared NN NN to be “ irrefutable . ” For good measure , and possibly with his JJ boss in mind , he added RB in June , “ I find it tragic that so JJ NNS in this country VBP JJ warming is some sort of elaborate hoax perpetuated by every credible scientist on the planet . ” Other NNP Department transition officials include CD more former Koch Industries lobbyists , Mike McKenna and Mike Catanzaro . Catanzaro RB served a stint as Communications Director for uber - denier Sen. James Inhofe . Team member William Greene is Deputy Legislative Director for the Safari Club International , which has lobbied for trophy - hunting exemptions from the Endangered NNP Act . Transitioner Daniel Simmons comes from CD Koch - funded groups , IER and ALEC . Somewhere on this DOE team , an unidentified someone has been “ counseled . ” Those were the announced consequences for distributing a questionnaire to DOE employees that , among other things , sought to identify anyone at the agency who had participated in NN - related meetings . After an uproar , and a refusal by current DOE staff to comply , the NNP team disowned the questionnaire and its McCarthy Era overtones ( In fairness to Senator Joe McCarthy , he was nowhere near as forgiving with the Russians ) . NASA Transition head Chris Shank is the # 2 staffer to House NNP Committee Chair Lamar Smith , and is expected to steer the agency away from its vital NNP NN and NN NN NN . Commerce : The Commerce Department ’s National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration is NASA ’s NN counterpart in NN NN . Commerce Secretary nominee Wilbur Ross has made billions on rescuing and leveraging distressed NNS , including coal , oil and NN firms . He ’s acknowledged that NN NN is a thing , offering suggestions to boost rail traffic and invest in ethanol as NN fixes . Ross ’s International Coal Group owned the Sago Mine in West Virginia . In January 2006 , 13 miners were trapped in an explosion at the mine . Only CD was rescued . In 2011 , Ross sold ICG to Arch Coal for a reported $ 3.4 billion . There ’s little indication that NOAA ’s NN NN is nearly as much in the crosshairs as NASA ’s . But , as CD former Commerce official VBD me , “ maybe they just have n’t gotten to it yet . ” EPA : Myron Ebell is a veteran political operative guiding EPA ’s transition team . Ebell dodges the “ denier ” label via a few old NN - denial standards : In the past , he ’s either VBN that NN NN is “ nothing to worry about , ” or that it will be awesome when fewer NNS die from the cold in a warming NN . When hackers stole thousands of emails from NN NNS in 2009 , Ebell described the NN NN community as a “ gang ” that was “ without honor . ” Multiple investigations cleared the NNS of any wrongdoing . RB on the team are attorneys David Schnare and Chris Horner of the American Tradition Institute . Schnare and Horner have specialized in filing lawsuits and sweeping Freedom of NNP Act requests against prominent NN NNS . Bankruptcy filings by coal NNS have revealed their funding for Schnare ’s and Horner ’s work . National Security Team : K.T. McFarland , ( Pictured left / Credit : Gage Skidmore / flickr ) another Fox contributor , MD become Deputy National Security Advisor . She ’s denounced the Obama Administration for citing NN NN as a JJ security issue . Monica Crowley , still another appointee drained from Fox NNP , will handle the press for National Security Advisor Mike Flynn . She recently called JJ warming “ a NN of separating Americans and Westerners from NNP and organized religion , and it ’s RB a wealth redistribution scheme . ” CIA : Wichita - based Congressman Mike Pompeo counts on David and Charles Koch as his constituents . He ’s been a business partner with Koch Industries through an oil supply firm , and has VBN that NNP Obama is “ horribly wrong ” about NN NN posing a JJ security NN . Interior : Doug Domenech is a former Virginia NN official who blames the “ regulatory war on coal ” for tough times in Appalachia , and VBZ that the miracle mineral can relieve NN poverty . But coal jobs have been on a steady swan dive since the Reagan Administration due to mechanization . Other Interior transition staffers include attorney Daniel Jorjani , who works for the Koch ’s Freedom Partners Chamber of Commerce . Authors Alyssa Katz describes this effort as having bankrolled anti-regulatory campaigns by the U.S. Chamber and others with $ 255 million in 2012 alone . Congressional staffer Harlan Watson served as chief NN negotiator under NNP George W. Bush . A leaked memo from ExxonMobil , written shortly after Bush ’s inauguration , sang Watson ’s praises and recommended him for a role in NN policy . And a few more : As Transportation Secretary - designate , Elaine Chao MD lead on major infrastructure projects , including the Obama Administration ’s plans to ramp up electric vehicle charging stations nationwide . Chao resigned her seat on the Bloomberg Philanthropies Board in 2015 when the charity decided to increase its support of the Sierra Club ’s “ Beyond Coal ” NN . She is married to Senate Majority Leader Mitch McConnell – a helpful reminder that sometimes , guilt by association means that you ’re guilty . Linda McMahon , nominee for the Small Business Administration , has cited “ conflicting NN on both sides of this issue . ” The former NNP Wrestling Entertainment executive did n’t VB so far as to declare NN NN is JJ and has a predetermined outcome . Senior Counselor Steve Bannon ’s Breitbart NNP site regularly touts NN denial . Bannon accused the Pope of “ hysteria ” for embracing NN action . Domestic transition head Ken Blackwell believes that NN models are rigged , and the NN is a “ hoax . ” HUD nominee Ben Carson has VBN there ’s “ no overwhelming NN ” on NN NN . Chief of Staff Reince Preibus VBD “ melting icebergs are n’t beheading Christians in the Middle East . ” UN Ambassador nominee Nikki Haley fought the Clean Power Plan as South Carolina Governor , RB as her NN endured lethal , record - smashing downpours . And Vice NNP - Elect Mike Pence has at times VBN NN NN is real , but that NN policy can’t impact it . But he ’s RB called it a “ myth . ” About the author : For questions or feedback about this piece , contact Brian Bienkowski at bbienkowski@ehn.org . text: In 1995 , a woman by the name of Nancy Lieder claimed to have had contact with extraterrestrial beings VBN as Zetas . She was visited by CD of her “ hybrid sons ” and was being prepared for a role as a messenger for the Zetas ( Zeta Talk ) . Nancy eventually quit her full NN job in California and moved to Wisconsin to pursue her JJ appointed position as messenger for the Zetas ( Zeta Talk ) . Official NN from the Zetas can be VBN online at Zeta Talk . Since 1995 , the Zetas have been revealing to Nancy plans they have for the JJ race as well as predictions of future events and catastrophes . In the early 2000s , Nancy made a wrong prediction of an event occurring and lost a JJ number of followers , yet a close knit following still remains . The belief is extraordinary because the only evidence is word of mouth . Nancy Lieder is the only contact with the Zetas . She proclaims JJ elaborate facts of realities not yet VBN to mankind and is quite thorough in their descriptions . So far , Nancy has been unable to accurately make predictions of future events stating that the Zetas can be wrong sometimes ( Zeta Talk ) . Nancy RB does not have any physical evidence of the existence of Zetas , but in a NN she posted on NNP , she describes a scene she experienced with a Zeta in such great detail that it MD be surprising if it were not real . But , again , the impressive detail and other anecdotal visions is the only evidence of Zeta existence . In the eyes of those invested in the belief , Nancy Lieder has asserted herself in a position of high credibility and authority through the telling ’s complex rules to live by , predictions of catastrophes , and enlightened happenings of the “ aftertime ” where alien - kind and humankind openly walk amongst each other . Nancy , as the contact , uses modern events IN JJ warming as verification of the Zeta ’s predictions , which her followers VBP . Those who are devout in their belief are misinterpreting real evidence of earthly phenomena as doings of the Zetas . There is a consistent community of Zeta believers on JJ NN , and those that participate in the community are actively adopting this belief more and more into their self concepts . In other words , the belief is taking up residents in their personal identity , which means that being a part of the group who is becoming who they are . When multiple NNS commune with each other in this NN , a bond is formed amongst the group and it becomes larger than they are as individuals . CD of the most prominent aspects of Nancy ’s messages is the “ aftertime ” and what NN after death will look IN . According to Terror Management NN , NNS will pursue meaningful experiences as well as beliefs that buffer against the fear of the inevitability of death . Since Zeta ’s messages expand into description of NN after death , JJ NNS find refuge in the belief that NNS will CD day live amongst aliens . “ Return to Main Page . ” WHO ARE THE ZETAS , www.grantchronicles.com/zeta02.htm.

text: In a " show of force , " the U.S. Navy dispatched an aircraft carrier and five escort ships to the South China NNP amid rising tensions between the U.S. , China and other Southeast Asian nations claiming territory in the disputed region , multiple defense officials confirmed to Fox NNP Friday . The dispatch sends a signal to China that the U.S. Navy will continue to conduct freedom of navigation patrols RB as China continues to " militarize " islands , those officials say . The Navy Times reported Thursday the U.S. sent the USS John C. Stennis , CD destroyers , CD cruisers and the 7th Fleet flagship . The deployment comes after Defense Secretary Ash Carter warned China over the militarization of its claimed artificial islands . The Stennis was joined by the Japan - based cruisers Antietam and Mobile Bay and destroyers Chung - Hoon and Stockdale , according to the Navy Times . The command ship USS Blue Ridge , is RB in the area and is heading for the Philippines . Officials VBD the Antietam was conducting a separate patrol from the Stennis . Tensions have increased over the last month after it was learned that China had placed NN - to - air - missiles on CD of the Paracel Islands . Since the incident , U.S. Pacific Command Chief Adm. Harry Harris has NN that China is militarizing the region . “ In my opinion China is clearly militarizing the South China NNP , ” Harris testified on Feb. 24 . “ You ’d have to VB in a JJ NNP to VB otherwise . ” The U.S. has completed patrols within the 12 - mile limit of China ’s artificial islands . Last October , the destroyer Lassen went through the region and on Jan. 30 , the destroyer Curtis Wilbur sailed near Trinton Island , part of the Paracel Islands . Carter took a harsh tone Tuesday speaking at a conference in San Francisco . He VBD if China does n’t heed the warning to stop militarizing the region , the U.S. was prepared to increase military deployments to the Asia - Pacific region and MD spend nearly $ 425 million to pay for more joint military exercise with NNS that feel threatened by Beijing . “ China must not pursue militarization in the South China NNP , ” China VBD in a speech in San Francisco . “ Specific actions will have specific consequences . ” Meanwhile , a Philippine official VBD he spotted five Chinese coast guard and navy ships at the Jackson Atoll last week that have not been previously stationed there before . However , by Wednesday the ships were gone . China RB announced Friday it will boost defense spending 7 to 8 percent in 2016 , its smallest increase in six NNS . However , it will still have the NN ’s largest standing military in the NN . The U.S. and other Southeast Asian governments with rival claims , have expressed alarm over China 's island construction , saying it raises tensions , threatens regional stability and MD violate freedom of navigation and overflight . Aside from China and the Philippines , Vietnam , Malaysia , Taiwan and Brunei have conflicting territorial claims in the Spratlys . Fox NNP ' Lucas Tomlinson and the Associated Press contributed to this report . Click for more from The Navy Times .

text: Justin Bieber released a JJ single called Yummy and it seems to be custom made to piss NNS off . For starters , the song ’s brain - numbing hook is somewhat infuriating in its own NN . It ’s IN it was written for toddlers . However , the verses make it clear that the actual subject of the song is very adult and very sexual . Here ’s an example of suggestive lyrics : While Bieber is clearly not the JJ artist to release a pop song with sexual innuendo , the promotion surrounding the single makes things extremely weird and uncomfortable . Whoever handler ’s Bieber ’s Instagram account decided it MD be a good idea to post pictures of random babies with the hashtag “ Yummy ” . Here are some examples . Bieber ’s IG account contains JJ more pictures of babies . To make things RB weirder , Bieber RB posted the song ’s title with pizza letters . It is now a widely VBN fact that “ pizza ” is a code word used in pedophile circles . It RB became a meme in internet forums such as 4 Chan . To those who understand the sick codes of these NNS , the combination of the song ’s lyrics with pictures of babies and the word “ Yummy ” written in pizza letters is difficult to ignore . Another widely VBN meme associated with these creeps is pedobear . Here ’s another post on Bieber ’s IG account in the midst of the Yummy promotional blitz . To make things RB stranger , the music NN adds another layer of “ what in hell ? ” The music NN takes place in a posh restaurant that is attended by posh - looking NNS . It ’s the type of place NNS in the elite MD VB to . At the beginning of the NN , the camera lingers on NNS playing music . While the NNS are playing , Bieber enjoys weird food with some weird - looking NNS . Considering the subject matter of the song , PRP can easily interpret that this orgy of food is actually meant to represent an orgy of NNS . The close - ups of NNS suggestively eating food are not very subtle . The final frame of the NN explains what the food in the NN actually represents . That frame is so symbolically important that it was RB posted on Bieber ’s Instagram account . The final frame basically VBZ that the dishes represent NNS . They are being “ tasted ” . And Bieber is a victim of the very system he is celebrating in the NN . What is Happening With Bieber ? Some might wonder why Bieber is partaking in this is creepy and overt NN - loving stuff while he MD , UH , not do it . The short answer is : He does n’t have a choice . Since the very beginning of his career , Bieber was always an industry pawn , with little or no NN over his career . As the last frame of Yummy appears to say , Bieber himself might have been abused by creeps in the music industry . Others wonder why Bieber – who is a devout and outspoken Christian – is partaking in this occult elite stuff . Indeed , there are lots of Jesus - related posts on his IG account ( although weirdly mixed with creepy , Yummy - related pictures ) . However , to VB a better picture of what is happening here , we need to look at Bieber ’s church : The powerful , star - studded Hillsong Church . The Church is famously attended by various stars such as Selena Gomez , Kylie and Kendall Jenner , Kourtney Kardashian , Vanessa Hudgens , Nick Jonas , Hailee Steinfeld , and Bono . All of them are pawns of the occult elite . The founder of the church Brian Houston RB has close ties with the political elite of Australia . All of this elite endorsement happened despite the fact that the Church has a dark secret : The father of the Church ’s founder Frank Houston admitted to abusing several young boys in Australia and NNP Zealand . And the leadership of the Church did everything possible to cover - up this sordid affair . Frank Houston , the father of Hillsong Church founder Brian Houston , was a pastor in NNP Zealand and Australia who abused as JJ as nine boys over the course of his ministry . In the 1960s and ’70s , CD victim was routinely subjected to sexual abuse from the age of 7 to 12 . In 1999 , his mother reported the abuse to the church . Although Brian Houston was legally obligated to report the crime , he did not do so . The victim later testified to the Royal Commission into Institutional Responses to NNP Sexual Abuse that Frank Houston offered him AU$ 10,000 as compensation at a McDonald ’s in the presence of Hillsong Church elder Nabi Saleh . During an internal church investigation , Frank Houston eventually confessed to the crime . The commission RB heard that he was involved in the sexual abuse of other NNS in NNP Zealand . Frank Houston resigned from his church in 2000 , which then merged with Hillsong Church . Contrary to what is stated in Frank Houston ’s resignation letter , he retired from the position of senior pastor of Sydney Christian NNP Centre in NNP 1999 and was never employed by Hillsong Church . A further internal investigation by Assemblies of NNP in Australia , in conjunction with the Assemblies of NNP in NNP Zealand , VBD six additional NN sexual abuse allegations , which were regarded as credible . In 2015 , the royal commission examined allegations that accused Brian Houston of concealing his father ’s crimes and censured him for failing to report his father to the police . In November 2018 , 60 Minutes aired a segment revisiting the sexual abuse scandal , because newly revealed documentation allegedly reveals that Brian Houston was deeply involved in a cover - up and that Frank Houston ’s abusive behaviour was worse than initially thought . Brian Houston allegedly used his position within the Assemblies of NNP in Australia denomination to conceal his father ’s serial NN sexual abuse . The matter was referred to the NNP South Wales Police Force , which confirmed that Brian Houston was under criminal investigation for failing to report a serious crime . Following the 60 Minutes NN , Hillsong released a statement in response to the allegations . – Ibid . So , to circle RB to the title of the article : Why did Justin Bieber tag babies “ Yummy ” on Instagram ? Because he is a pawn of the entertainment industry which is controlled by some very sick NNS . Since the beginning of his career , Bieber has been caught up in a never - ending whirlwind of strange , humiliating events and has often displayed bizarre behavior . He ’s always been a “ whipping boy ” of the industry and the face of crappy pop music . With Yummy , the pattern continues . His handlers purposely turned Yummy into some kind of “ NN - lover ” anthem by associating it with overt imagery and creepy Instagram posts . In short , Bieber was used to push CD of the elite ’s favorite agendas : The normalization and the celebration of NN abuse . P.S. text: Editor 's note : " Glenn Beck " is on Headline NNP nightly at 7 and 9 ET . NNP YORK ( CNN ) -- We all VBP to live in a NN that 's clean , healthy and prosperous . We all VBP to hand that NN off to our NNS in slightly better shape than we received it . No NN , RB the supposedly evil oil executive , has any reason to VB anything different . But , for some reason , we find ourselves searching for villains . Surely they exist , but the endless quest to create them sometimes overwhelms our better judgment , whether intentional or not . Congress has picked " Big Oil " as their enemy of the week . These NNS inexplicably put profits above NNS , ravaging the environment and financially assaulting the poor to put another couple of dollars on their balance sheet . That 's the storyline we 've all been taught . Yes , times are tough for JJ . Sure , oil NNS make a lot of cash . But , for that money , they VBP us to work , VB ambulances to the hospital , keep our homes warm , and employ thousands of our friends and neighbors while financing their retirement , paying their NN care , and providing NN to millions . Because of capitalism , they have the incentive to do that . I 've yet to VB what our NN does for us with their rather JJ chunk of each gallon of NN we buy , and I 've yet to VB them offer to return it or suggest a NN - tax - windfall - tax - tax . The other villain of the moment is the JJ warming " denier . " Anyone who disagrees , RB in the slightest , must be ridiculed . On " 60 Minutes " last weekend , Al Gore VBD : " They 're almost IN the ones who still VBP that the moon landing was staged in a movie lot in Arizona and those who VBP the NNP is JJ . That demeans them a little bit , but it 's not that far off . " Approximately 6 percent of Americans VBP in the JJ moon landing NN , although I 've always heard there was a conspiratorial consensus that it was staged in Nevada , not Arizona . I 'm VBG to guess quite a bit less than 6 percent VB in a JJ NNP , but no NN seems to be asking that question in polls anymore , so I can't be sure . So , who are those NNS Gore was demeaning " a little bit " by these comparisons ? There 's a good chance it 's you . That 's because the vast majority of Americans VBP something that categorizes them as a JJ earther to environmentalists IN Gore . Despite the NN 's CD - sided view ( the Business and NNP Institute VBZ dissenting voices about JJ warming are outnumbered on CBS NNP broadcasts by a 38 to 1 ratio ) , only 21 percent of Americans say " the release of greenhouse gasses is the most important factor causing JJ warming " according to a 2007 NNP York Times / CBS NNP poll . The " 60 Minutes " piece was n't just filled with misrepresentations of opinion ; it had plenty of Gore - style hypocrisy . He was embroiled in controversy when it was revealed his mansion used 20 times more NN than the average American . His explanation ? " Since then " his house has been retrofitted with solar panels . I 'm sure Eliot Spitzer has n't been renting JJ women since he was caught either . ( Although I 'm not betting my NN on it . ) We then VBP footage of Gore 's parents ' farm that will , sometime in the future , be run on wind power . Apparently , the windmill store has been out of stock for the past 20 NNS . Perhaps most comically , Gore is seen dragging an entire film crew on a jet to India to give a NN presentation to about 100 NNS . Gore claimed : " We just do n't have any choice . I wish I knew a better NN to do it . I constantly ask myself , ' How can I be more effective in getting this message across ? ' " The most effective thing you can VB of is flying halfway across the NN to speak with 100 NNS ? Maybe you had other things to do while you were there , but I 'd be surprised if there was anything essential that MD n't be accomplished with a telephone and a computer . The NNS in India will be able to VB your fancy graphs on their screens , and you 'll cut demand for those evil overseas flights . The entire " 60 Minutes " piece felt IN a commercial for Gore 's upcoming commercials . He 's spending $ 300 million in advertising to convince NNS of something he claims there is already a consensus on . To put that much money into perspective ; it 's more than Sen. Barack Obama , Sen. Hillary NNP , Sen. John Edwards , Sen. John McCain , former Gov. Mike Huckabee and Rep. Ron Paul raised in all of last NN combined . VB of it as VBG green by getting lots of green . Where is all that money coming from ? Gore VBZ he 's donating his profits from " An Inconvenient NNP , " and his Nobel Peace Prize cash award . Let 's be generous and say there 's only $ 290 million left to explain . Apparently , a follow - up question to find the origins of this nine - figure sum MD have involved six seconds that " 60 Minutes " was n't willing to commit . What is there to learn from all of this ? Whether it 's politicians on both sides of the aisle or our vaunted JJ superheroes , the quest for power overwhelms RB the slightest instinct of self - examination . In the end , the timing of the Gore interview airing MD n't have been better . It fell on the same weekend as the JJ " NNP Hour , " when the NN supposedly came together to turn our attention to NN NN by shutting the lights off for an hour . The imagery of monuments IN the Sears Tower in Chicago , Illinois , VBG dark was plastered over newscasts everywhere . But those pictures highlighted the JJ warming movement and the congressional attacks on NN NNS in an entirely unintended NN . Behind the darkened Sears Tower was the city of Chicago , with lights shining brightly as far as the eye MD VB . For CD hour the Sears Tower knew what it was IN to be Al Gore : A larger than NN symbol , blocking our view of reality . The opinions expressed in this commentary are solely those of the writer .

text: As the consequences of light pollution have become more visible , lighting regulations have started to evolve . Canada passed bird - friendly lighting ( and construction ) laws in the mid-1990s , and now numerous cities — including Toronto , Washington , D.C. , and NNP York — participate in lights - out campaigns during peak migration seasons . And in 2016 , the American Medical Association responded to the growing NN of evidence suggesting that intense LEDs are harmful to JJ NN by recommending that communities VBP streetlights to “ minimize and VB blue - rich JJ lighting . ” Entire cities are RB re-doing their lights in an attempt to reclaim the night and decrease NN waste . Flagstaff , Arizona , was the JJ city to be designated a Dark Sky Community by the International Dark - Sky Association , and Chicago is in the process of retrofitting its fixtures . So far , hesitations about dimmer , sparser lighting causing an uptick in crime or decreased safety at night have not been supported by the data ; in Chicago ’s West Garfield Park , more brightly lit alleys actually led to an increase in reported crime . And anecdotally , NNS are finding that less glaring lighting makes it easier to VB in unlit areas , because our eyes adapt more quickly to the dark . For some cities , eliminating light pollution is RB a NN to increase tourism revenue while strengthening humanity ’s connection to the night sky . Consider the town of Jasper , Alberta . Nestled in the remote Canadian Rockies , Jasper is a haven for those who love the mountains , wildlife , and the outdoors . Just a few minutes drive outside town , stargazers can VB a dazzling array of nighttime wonders , from oft - hidden stars and satellites to meteorites and the aurora borealis . Since 2010 , the city has hosted a Dark Sky Festival in the fall that brings in thousands of NNS . But Jasper residents are n’t content to have the nighttime wonders visible only just beyond their borders . The town is now working with Lumican , a Canadian NN that partners with the International Dark - Sky Association , to re-do all its streetlights . Slated to start this summer , the town ’s roughly 400 fixtures will be replaced with shielded Lumican LEDs set to color temperatures ranging between 1,700 and 2,200 Kelvin , which efficiently cast an amber glow while limiting more harmful blue wavelengths . “ What caught our attention at RB was how horrible all these JJ LED street lights looked ; so glary , prison - UH , and overly bright , ” VBZ Lumican ’s Lara Mitchell . When she realized that such street lighting erases stars and damages ecosystems , the NN turned toward fighting light pollution . Throughout North America and Europe , dark sky parks are on the rise , and festivals IN Jasper ’s are flourishing . NNS are beginning to reconnect with the sparkling canvas that swirls overhead just as technologies are becoming available on scales that will VB humanity reclaim more of this natural nighttime majesty — if we choose to use them . Christopher Kyba , the scientist who studies light pollution on a JJ level , points to van Gogh ’s “ Cafe Terrace at Night ” as his image of an ideal nighttime scene . “ This is the dream of what you VBP to have — nice , warm , uniform lighting . You can VB lots of stars up above , the facades are unlit , ” he VBZ . “ You look a hundred - something NNS in the past to VB the idealized lighting . ”

text: On Reddit , some “ Game of Thrones ” fans subscribe to a tortuous NN that a group of old , scholarly men — the maesters — are part of a sprawling and hidden NN to exert NN over the show ’s mythical kingdom . They write thousands of words to each other proving that every obscure clue adds up to a big picture that only they can VB . Just a few clicks away , other Reddit users are sure that a secretive group — the Illuminati — is part of a sprawling and hidden NN to VB the real NN . They do exactly the same thing . There are some clear parallels between fan NN theories and political NN theories . They were once confined to the far corners of American culture , but in recent NNS have flourished thanks in part to internet message boards and JJ NN , which offer anyone the opportunity to publish , debunk , rebunk and remix their own imaginary concepts and share them with RB - minded theorists . The theories , however , share more than just message boards . The psychology of groups and the internet ’s propensity to amplify outlandish content and reward the NNS who create it has created the kind of feedback loops in which bizarre theories — from both fantasy fans and the politically paranoid — flourish . Russell Zimmerman , 41 , a writer , game developer and military historian , loves to theorize about “ Game of Thrones , ” particularly the books on which it is based , George R.R. Martin ’s series , “ A Song of NNP and Fire . ” But some theories are RB too much for him , such as CD that argues CD character ( Varys , the spymaster ) is secretly a NN NN . “ To me , that 's about the level of ‘ out there ’ crazy - talk as assuming there 's a kiddie porn ring in the basement of a pizza shop without a basement , ” he VBD , referring to the “ NN ” NN NN that remains popular on the fringes of the far NN . “ Thrones ” is not the only show with a strong internet following and crackpot theories . The popular Adult Swim show “ Rick and Morty ” has various fan guesses at the show ’s secrets . BBC ’s “ NNP Who , ” which follows a NN - traveling NN - looking alien exploring the universe , has its own theories . And in the early days of the consumer internet , “ The X - Files , ” a show that often touched on real - NN NN theories , gave birth to some of the JJ online fan theories . Meanwhile , any number of real - NN NN theories have taken hold among various political and JJ groups on the internet . Joseph Uscinski , associate professor of political NN at the NNP of Miami and author of “ NNP Theories and the NNPS Who VBP Them , ” VBD diehard fans and NN theorists share a love of extrapolating from the facts in their possession . “ NN theories are similar to fan fiction in that they both allow NNS to make up whatever they VBP , ” he VBD . Uscinski VBD that whether it ’s “ Game of Thrones , ” “ Star Wars ” or the JFK assassination , NNS can take a plot or an event and “ VB to wherever they VBP with it . ” As an example , Uscinski cited Qanon , a remarkably popular genre of NN theories that generally center on a mysterious figure who claims that NNP Donald NNP is working to uncover a powerful group of pedophiles . “ You have this anonymous poster , Q , who puts out nonsensical clues and NNS try to make sense of it and try to figure out what happens next , ” he VBD . “ They are enjoying this . They VBP piecing these things together . It ’s a fan thing for them . ” Brendon Boutin , 32 , who runs a popular “ Game of Thrones ” recap channel , “ NNP of Recaps , ” VBD the excitement generated by both kinds of theories drove their popularity . “ I VBP the biggest similarity is the feeling you VBP , the rush of hunting for the NN and discovering secret knowledge , ” Boutin VBD by email . “ I watched some 9/11 ‘ NN ’ videos RB in the day , and those brought about the same thrill as discovering Jon Snow 's parentage . ” “ Game of Thrones ” is far from the only show to have a fervent fanbase that has created its own theories , but few have created a community as rich and active , both online and off . Laurel Steinberg , a NNP York - based relationship therapist , VBD the behavior shown by NN theorists and superfans is “ absolutely analogous . ” “ NNS VBP to feel part of a group , part of a movement , part of a team , ” Steinberg VBD . “ It feels good to have something that gives them a identity . It feels good to have something to be excited about , and watch develop in real NN . ” But “ Thrones ” fandom is RB susceptible to the same internet dynamics that have spurred ever - more outlandish NN theories , rewarding NNS who can draw the most attention . “ You 're able to create community , and then become an expert . You ’ve ridden the tailcoats of the star and then you become a breakout star in that community , ” Steinberg VBD . ” You become an influencer . ” Chloe Ketchum , 27 , who co-hosts a podcast about the series , “ Girls Gone Canon , ” VBD that while she enjoys the feeling of community around “ Game of Thrones , ” she ’s RB seen the lengths some fans will VB to attract a following . “ There are creators that push shock value to VB views , ” Ketchum VBD . “ NNS will do anything for attention . ” While there are similarities in the psychology behind intense fandoms and political conspiracists , Uscinski stressed that they result in divergent behaviors . He VBD fans will generally abandon theories that do n’t hold up , whereas NN theorists ignore evidence that proves them wrong . There ’s RB the real - NN consequences . NN theories around politics and current events have inspired some NNS to commit acts of violence , which has led to efforts by politicians and activist groups to force internet platforms to reign in the spread of the disinformation that can fuel the theories . “ When the show comes out , NNS will disregard their theories that did n’t turn out to be true , ” he VBD . “ But with JJ earthers , when they do an experiment and it does n’t show them what they VBP , they still hold that belief anyway . They ’re much more invested ”

text: Taiwan NN - elect TsaiIng - wen must " prove " her Democratic Progressive Party ( DPP ) is not pro-independence before Beijing will deal with her , a senior member of China 's largely rubber stamp parliament VBD on Thursday . China considers self - ruled Taiwan a wayward province , to be brought under its NN by force if necessary . Defeated Nationalist forces fled to Taiwan in 1949 after the Chinese civil war . Beijing has repeatedly warned against any moves towards independence since January 's landslide win by Tsai and her DPP in presidential and parliamentary elections . Tsai assumes office in NNP . While the DPP 's charter calls for the island 's formal independence , senior DPP leaders have not publicly stated that clause of late and Tsai has VBN she wishes to have peace with China and to maintain the status quo . Speaking on the sidelines of China 's annual parliamentary session , Wang Yifu , who leads the Chinese - appointed Taiwan delegation to parliament , VBD the DPP 's independence platform " makes the NN feel uneasy " . Wang had been asked by a reporter to comment on Tsai 's pledge to develop bilateral relations under the framework of Taiwan 's constitution which stipulates that Taiwan and the Chinese mainland are part of " CD China " . Tsai 's pledge " contradicts " the independence clause in the DPP 's own charter , Wang VBD , adding that she and the DPP MD have to " prove ( the DPP ) is not a Taiwan independence party " . " This is the basis for cross - Strait exchanges , " VBD Wang , who is RB NN of the All - China Federation of Taiwan Compatriots - a Chinese NN group composed of Taiwanese exiles , defectors and their descendants . The DPP did not respond to a request for comment . China appoints a Taiwan delegation to parliament every NN to VB up its sovereignty claims over the island , RB though nobody in proudly democratic Taiwan votes for them . Wang stopped short of spelling out whether China wants the DPP to drop , revise or freeze the independence clause in its charter . Wang urged DPP leaders to " appreciate and reciprocate the mainland 's goodwill " . Chinese NNP Xi Jinping VBD last week China MD never allow the historical tragedy of Taiwan being " split " off from the rest of the country to happen again , warning the island against any moves towards formal independence . Japan ruled Taiwan as a colony for about five decades until the end of NNP War II . China 's last dynasty , the Qing , had ceded Taiwan to Japan in 1895 after losing the JJ Sino - Japanese war .

text: Hillary NNP ’s abrupt departure from a Sept. 11 ceremony in NNP York after falling ill Sunday and the subsequent disclosure that she is suffering from pneumonia are likely to intensify scrutiny on the Democratic nominee ’s NN and potentially inject a JJ NN issue into a race between CD of the oldest candidates ever to seek the White House . text: “ The folksiness will irk some critics … But criticizing Friedman for humanizing and boiling down big topics is IN complaining that Mick Jagger used NN to sell songs : It is what he does well . ” – John Micklethwait , review of Thank You for Being Late , in The NNP York Times With apologies to Mr. Micklethwait , the hands that typed these lines implying Thomas Friedman is a Mick Jagger of letters should be chopped off and mailed to the singer ’s doorstep in penance . Mick Jagger MD excite the NN in CD note , while Thomas Friedman needs 461 pages to say , “ Shit happens . ” Joan of Arc and Charles Manson had more in common . Thomas Friedman was once a NN of great influence . His columns were must - reads for every senator and congressperson . He helped spread the globalization gospel and push us into war in Iraq . But he ’s destined now to be more famous as a literary figure . No modern writer has been lampooned more . Hundreds if not thousands of man-hours have been spent teaching robots to produce automated Friedman - prose , in what collectively is a half - vicious , half - loving tribute to a NN who raised bad writing to the level of an art form . We will remember Friedman for interviewing 76 percent of the NN ’s taxi drivers , for predicting “ the next six months will be critical ” on 14 occasions over CD and a half NNS ( birthing the neologism , “ the Friedman unit “ ) , and for his unmatched , NNP - given ability to write nonsensical metaphors , IN his classic “ rule of holes ” : “ When you ’re in CD , stop digging . When you ’re in three , bring a lot of shovels . ” Friedman ’s great anti-gift is his ability to use JJ words when only a few are necessary . He became famous as a newspaper columnist for taking simple CD - sentence observations IN , “ Wow , everyone has a cell phone these days , ” and blowing them out into furious 850 - word trash - fires of mismatched imagery and circular argument . The double - axel version of this feat was to then rewrite that same column over and over again , in the same newspaper , only piling on more incongruous imagery and skewing rhetoric to further stoke that CD thought into an RB higher and angrier fire . For nearly CD decades now , Friedman has been telling us that something big is happening , technology is growing at a rate beyond the ability of humans to adapt ( this is where the part about noticing everyone has a cell phone comes in ) , and that we have to stop doing things the old NN and take a brave step into the future . He wrote this column so JJ times that RB four NNS ago – eight Friedman units – Hamilton Nolan wrote a piece in Gawker titled “ Thomas Friedman writes his only column again ” ( Friedman ’s “ only column ” has by now outlived hundreds of NN outlets , Gawker and my own NNP York Press among them ) . Nolan cited a piece in the Times called “ The Rise of Popularism , ” in which Friedman argued , again , that technology was racing past humanity ’s ability to govern itself wisely . A very conservative guess is that Friedman has written this column at least a hundred times . Maybe 200 . Maybe more . If you ’re rolling your eyes at this , check yourself . VB about what an awesome accomplishment that is . It takes an extraordinary discipline to turn CD sentence of thought into hundreds of thousands of words . We all repeat ourselves in the punditry business . Most of us only have a few ideas . Friedman has fewer than most – it ’s really just CD , technology future derp ! – but he ’s attacked that CD idea with such relentless evangelical NN that he is leaving behind as a monument to it the literary equivalent of the Giza pyramid complex . This decades - JJ gigantic art project is based upon a vast architecture of needless complication , a process he describes in this JJ book of his , Thank You for Being Late , as “ translating English into English . ” Build a sentence into a column ; build a column into JJ columns ; build JJ columns into a book ; build CD book into JJ books . Then start over ! Eleven NNS ago , when Friedman wrote his seminal explainer book , The NNP is NNP – a book whose title metaphor was hilariously based on the wrong premise that NNS are more interconnected on a JJ NN than on a round CD – he combined CD giant sets of metaphors to describe that same idea that technology was outpacing our ability to govern ourselves . He VBD rapid NNS in the NN were being fueled by 10 “ flatteners ” ( things IN the end of communism , Netscape , outsourcing , etc. ) which in turn were amplified by he VBD were four “ steroids ” : Digital , Mobile , Personal and Virtual . Those four steroids actually turned out to be six – changing or extending the terms of his imagery midstream is a classic Friedmanism – and the sixth “ steroid , ” JJ wireless devices , was actually a JJ group of steroids he called “ uber-steroids . ” This was confusing because the tenth item in Friedman ’s list of “ flatteners ” was the group of four steroids . So his last flattener was a JJ group of steroids and his last steroid was a JJ group of uber - steroids . Which meant we had uber - steroids amplifying steroids amplifying flatteners , with each list comprising items that belonged to other lists . He mashed all of that together for 470 pages or so . Eleven NNS and countless columns later , the JJ book Thank You for Being Late takes that same structure and boldly complicates it . This book is built , again , around the idea that technological NN is advancing beyond our ability to adapt . The culprits this NN are three great “ Accelerations ” : Moore ’s Law ( microchip processing power doubles every 18 to 24 months ) , the market ( globalization ) and Mother Nature , which is his English - language term for the English - language term , “ NN NN and biodiversity loss . ” These Three Accelerations in turn are transforming five key “ realms , ” which he lists as “ the workplace , politics , geopolitics , ethics , and the community . ” If you ’re wondering what ’s left over when you subtract , from the subset of all things , “ the workplace , politics , geopolitics , ethics , and the community , ” you ’re on to something . Because it turns out that the book is about how something is happening to – everything ! “ In short , ” Friedman VBZ , in the opening chapter of Late , “ this book is CD giant column about the NN today . ” Incidentally , whenever Friedman uses the phrase , “ In short … ” he ’s about to take the short form of an idea and make it longer , e.g . “ In short , the only NN for Mexico to thrive is with a strategy of reform retail that will enable it to beat China to the top , not the bottom , because China is not focused on beating Mexico as much as it is on beating America . ” To his credit , in Thank You for Being Late , Friedman debuts the use of , “ To make a short NN RB , ” which is n’t exactly fixing the problem . But it is funnier . So how giant is this JJ giant column ? Really giant . There are n’t enough drugs in the NN to VB anyone through Thank You for Being Late in CD sitting . Take the chapter about Mother Nature , which opens with a NN about a day in July , 2015 when the heat index in southern Iran reached 163 degrees . That NN item gives the author an opening to introduce the concept of a “ black elephant , ” an ominous ( if you VBP Friedman ) term apparently explained to him by environmentalist Adam Sweidan : “ [ It is ] a cross between a ‘ black swan ’ – a rare , low - probability , unanticipated event with enormous ramifications – and ‘ the elephant in the room ’ : a problem that is widely visible to everyone , yet that no NN wants to address , RB though we absolutely VBP that CD day it will have vast , black - swan - JJ consequences . ” You MD VB he MD just say , “ The NN NN problem is a cross between a black swan and the elephant in the room – or , as I VBP to call it , a Black Elephant . ” Instead he leads audiences through drawn - out explanations of CD everyday terms . Moreover his unnecessary definition of “ the elephant in the room ” contains the phrase “ black swan , ” making what was originally a relatively simple idea now a kind of circular movie - within - a - movie image that is more than a little hard to follow : “ A black elephant is a cross between a black swan event and the elephant in the room , which is an ignored but visibly obvious problem that will inevitably become a black swan event . ” You ’re still grappling with that when you learn “ there are a herd of JJ black elephants out there . ” Friedman names at least four : JJ warming , deforestation , NN acidification and mass biodiversity extinction . He quotes Sweidan as saying of these : “ When they hit , we ’ll claim they were black swans that no NN MD have predicted , but in fact they were black elephants , very visible RB now . ” Friedman just got finished telling us that a black elephant is half black swan , and half elephant in the room that will inevitably become a black swan . But now that half - swan , half swan - within - an - elephant is being contrasted with a black swan : in the near future , things that are really black elephants will be misidentified as black swans . So that ’s weird . While you ’re sorting that out , Friedman tells you that the you that a 163 - degree heat index in Iran is another black elephant , because “ you can VB it sitting in a room , you can feel it , and you can read about it in the newspaper . ” He adds : “ IN any black elephant , you RB VBP that it is so far outside the norm that it has all the characteristics of a black swan – that it is the harbinger of some very big , unpredictable NNS in our NN system we MD be unable to VB . ” The next thing he VBZ is that we spend tons of money preparing for the relatively unlikely event of nuclear war , but virtually nothing to prevent a very likely NN NN catastrophe . He MD have just led the chapter with that . But that MD defeat the purpose of translating English into English . You ’re still wondering what happened to that elephant reading a newspaper about a black swan roasting in the desert when Friedman moves on to the next NN - devouring exercise , telling us about the four phrases we need to master to learn “ NN - speak . ” All four sound IN the same idea and are immediately forgettable : “ Just a few NNS ago … but then something changed . ” “ Wow , I ’ve never seen that before . ” “ Well , usually , but now I do n’t VB anymore . ” “ We have n’t seen anything IN that since . ” Quick , name any of those phrases you just read . You can ’t ! But you “ have to master ” all of them to grasp the rapidity of NN disturbances , which Friedman now describes as Mother Nature moving into the “ second half of the chessboard . ” This is a reference to a metaphor from an earlier chapter recalling the ancient tale of the mathematician who asked a king for a reward . The master asked to have CD grain of rice put on CD corner of a chessboard , and then to have twice as JJ put on the next square , and to keep VBG , on and on to the end . The punchline is that after doubling down 64 times , you end up with 18 quintillion grains of rice or something – more than you ’d have guessed ! Which is a metaphor for how much faster than we VBP is the pace of NN all around us , be it in technology , JJ displacement or , in this case , the environment . Did you VB that “ megatoothed sharks prowled the oceans ” the last NN the CO2 concentration in the NN ’s NN was as high as it was in Hawaii on NNP 3rd , 2013 , an astonishing four hundred parts per million ? You probably did n’t , because things that prowl usually have NNS – but anyway , RB to the elephants : “ And sometimes the records being broken as Mother Nature enters the second half of the chessboard are so numerous and profound , NN agencies tracking them seem to run out of RB NN - speak to describe the black elephants they are seeing . ” This must be that talent for “ boiling things down ” that Mr. Micklethwait talked about ! NNP bless this NN . MD he never stop writing books . Let ’s grow this pie as big as we can . P.S. winners of the extraordinary # friedmangraphs contest to be announced soon . text: The coming Full Hunter ’s Moon will grace our skies on October 24th , occurring in the sign of Taurus . As you are smudging your aura using the smudging tool of choice , recite the following : “ I am cleansing myself , freeing myself from all negativity . I am cleansing myself of the struggles and challenges from my past . I am releasing my past mistakes and cleansing myself so that I can be my true self . I am cleansing and opening my heart . I am aligned with the Universe . My heart is now open . ” # 2 – Shift your attention now from your aura to the NN around you . It is safe for me to be in this NN . I call this NN home , and my home is cleansed and free from negativity . It is safe for me to be here . I am renewed . ” # 3 – Light your incense or oil burner , selecting a scent that brings you a feeling of calm and serenity . # 4 – Light your candle , placing it either next to you on the floor or nearby on the table if you are sitting up to a table . # 5 – Close your eyes and select a symbol , either a triangle , circle or heart . Do n’t overthink this , trust your intuition and choose the JJ symbol that comes to mind . Taking your pen and paper , draw the symbol of choice on it . # 6 – Take your candle and place it on top of the symbol you just drew , doing your best to center it on the image . Using your leaves and / or flowers , create a visually appealing or ‘ pretty ’ display . Follow your heart , it will provide you with the direction of where to place everything . # 7 – Find a comfortable NN of sitting close to your candle . If you are sitting up to a table , make sure that your NNS are JJ on the floor in order to ground yourself throughout the remainder of the ritual . In the same NN , if you are seated on the floor , find a position that leaves you feeling ground and secure . # 8 – Place CD hand over your heart , another on your belly . The exact location will be guided by your intuition . Close your eyes , taking 10 deep breaths . Shut out all outside distractions , focusing only on your breathing in the moment . # 9 – Take a single flower or leaf from alongside your candle , placing it in the palm of your hand . Looking closely at the item , recite the following three times : “ I trust the NN of Mother NNP . She guides me as to what in my NN I need to release . ” # 10 – Ensuring that the flower or leaf remains in the palm of your hand , bring your hands together into a prayer position . Close your eyes , focusing on your breathing again until you feel completely calm , then repeat the mantra from the previous point . # 11 – Continue to hold onto your flower or leaf as you stand up and start to shake out your NN . As you do so , visualize all the NN , anxiety , and hurt falling free from your NN . Continue to shake until you feel as though all the negativity has been released , leaving you cleansed and pure . # 12 – Carefully sitting RB down , hold up your leaf or flower and exhale onto it , releasing any remaining negative NN or anxiety into the object . Place the flower or leaf off to the side , ensuring that you VBP which it is . You need to properly dispose of this item in order to remove this negative NN from your NN once and for all . # 13 – Pick up another flower or leaf , placing it in the palm of your hand just as you did the last . Looking closely at it , recite the following three times : “ I trust the NN of Mother NNP . She both supports and nourishes my soul . ” # 14 – Just as you did the last NN , bring your hands into the prayer position with the flower or leaf between your palms . Close your eyes and take 10 deep , JJ breaths . With each of the JJ 9 breaths , visualize clean , pure NN coming into your NN . On the 10th breath , open your eyes looking at the flower or leaf . Visualize beauty , happiness , support , and peace coming from the leaf or flower as you inhale , entering into your NN and nourishing your soul . # 15 – Place the flower or leaf off to the side with the last NN . # 16 – Look RB to the candle , returning your hands to the prayer position . Recite the following : “ I call on my guardian angel and my spirit guides to VB me to stay calm and embrace peace . I trust that the NN of Mother NNP is always working to guide me and protect me . I genuinely appreciate the NN that Mother NNP is working in my NN . I appreciate all the divine beings , spirits , and guardians that work to support me , encourage me and assist me on my NN ’s journey . Thank you . Thank you . Thank you . ” # 17 – This is the end of your ritual . Blow out the candle to finish . At this point , take the CD leaves or flowers that you have set aside during the ritual and dispose of them appropriately . This can be done by releasing them from the top of a tall building or hill into the wind , throwing them into the NN or burying them in a garden or wooded area .
