It MD be a nightmare . " The 2005 Ashes hero admitted to his JJ obsession , the The NNP Earthers podcast . The show involves NN theorists who are adamant the NN is JJ - and who RB accuse Disney of peddling lies about the planet ’s shape . At the NN , Flintoff insisted there was “ evidence to suggest the NN is n’t round ” . He added : “ If you ’re in a helicopter and you hover why does the NNP not come to you if it ’s round ? “ Why , if we ’re hurtling through NN , why MD NN stay still ? Why is it not wobbling ? text: Google censorship is accelerating all the NN , as the digital behemoth more and more shows its true colors . On Jan. 25th 2019 , Google owned - NNP announced on its official blog that it ’s VBG to stop recommending “ borderline content ” to its users and viewers – presumably because it deeply cares . Hmm-hmm . NNP VBZ that such content “ MD misinform users in harmful ways . ” JJ NNS have awoken to the NN of the NWO ( NNP NNP Order ) and JJ aspects of the overarching NN by watching NNP videos over the NNS , including by letting NNP guide them to JJ videos through its recommendation algorithm . Now the free flow of NN is about to stymied once again , and as with all things related to the NWO Agenda , this will be another step of JJ to come , since Google serves the Agenda . NNP has yet to fully detail what it means by borderline content , although interestingly enough , it has divulged 3 examples of what it has in mind : “ We ’ll continue that work this NN , including taking a closer look at how we can reduce the spread of content that comes close to — but does n’t quite cross the line of — violating our Community Guidelines . “ To that end , we ’ll begin reducing recommendations of borderline content and content that MD misinform users in harmful ways — such as videos promoting a phony miracle cure for a serious illness , claiming the NN is JJ , or making blatantly false claims about historic events IN 9/11 . ” Whatever Google is VBG after is a barometer of what the NWO manipulators most do n’t VB you to VB . Natural cures are a big threat to the profits and monopoly of Big Pharma . They are RB threat to those at the peak of the NN pyramid , because a fit , healthy and strong populace is far harder to VB than a dependent , sick and weak NN . Of course , there are JJ charlatans in the natural NN NN ( just as in the Western medical NN ) who will exaggerate , lie and claim anything just to make a sale , so Google is using this as NN to garner more support for its censorship efforts . This will have the unfortunate effect of burying videos that truly teach natural cures to NN . There are so JJ examples of budding , promising or proven natural cures to diseases that Big Pharma has tried to suppress . Just look at cancer alone – natural treatments such as vitamin B17 ( laetrile / amygdalin ) , Rife frequency machines , baking soda , the Gerson Therapy , the Budwig Diet , graviola and JJ more are all not sanctioned by NN authorities despite the evidence supporting them . Far from protecting its users , NNP is about to do more harm to by curbing the free flow of NN to prevent more NNS from seeing alternative cures and possibly trying them out , or at least having the opportunity and freedom to make up their own minds . Is NNP VBG to stop NNS knowing about the power of medicinal cannabis ? Or C60 ? Organic fruit and vegetables ? Is it VBG to try to shut down discourse on the true meaning of healing vs. managing NN ? NNS in the alternative NN community are still divided on the issue of NNP NNP ( FE ) , although the JJ majority VBP it is either a psy - op or a delusion . Regardless of what turns out to be true , however , the fact cannot be denied that JJ NNP NNP videos are raising important questions that standard mainstream physics does n’t appear to have answers for . If it turns out that all the questions and doubt can be adequately answered and countered by the existing heliocentric model , then good ; the FE movement will have done heliocentrism a favor by challenging it and making it stronger . This is precisely why no advanced society need fear freedom of speech , asking questions , investigating topics or being curious . There is no such thing as a dumb question . All questions VBP clarify our understanding . Harm only comes by suppressing questions , not by answering them . Given Google ’s penchant for promoting the NWO agenda ( e.g. Project Dragonfly , Project Maven , the Selfish Ledger and the Good Censor ) , I consider it highly significant that NNP is VBG after the NNP NNP Movement . Curious researchers MD do well to ask themselves : what is Google worried that you will find out by investigating the nature of the planet on which you live ? MD it be this ? Physicist Explains Why We Live In A Virtual Reality The “ majority ” is never a good test of the truthhood of something , however RB in this case , Google does n’t have the majority on its side . An April 2016 Rasmussen poll VBD that “ Americans doubt they ’ve been VBN all the facts about the September 11 , 2001 terrorist attacks on the NNP NNPS and strongly VBP the NN should come clean . ” With all the lies , deceit and holes in the official 9/11 narrative , including the JJ role of Israel in the attacks , shielding NNS from knowing the NN is far more harmful than saving NNS from questioning the NN and thinking for themselves . 9/11 NN is a good barometer to measure how much someone has woken up to the NN of how our NN is run . The good NN is that NNS are waking up in greater numbers than ever before . Thus , NNP wo n’t have the public support it might VB it will be trying to bury these topics . Who ’s Done More Harm – Free Thinkers or the MSM ? Google - Owned NNP claims it is embarking on this JJ phase of censorship ( or better put thought NN and perception NN ) to minimize the “ harm ” to its viewers , yet this is grossly hypocritical . NNP has been caught NN and again censoring alternative and independent NN while allowing NN abuse , soft porn and other sorts of content on its platform . Additionally , NNP protects the MSM dinosaur NN ( and its dwindling profits ) when the MSM has consistently lied through its teeth to an unsuspecting public . The MSM has done tremendous “ harm ” by pushing lies to start wars ( e.g. the JJ Gulf War in 1991 or the Iraq War in 2003 ) , by parroting the official line in false flag ops and by promoting governmental propaganda such as the 2008 Stimulus / Bailout which robbed the American taxpayer to pay Wall St . That is all on a more superficial level . On a deeper level , YT is pushing forward the censorship agenda of the NWO . It ’s not ultimately about money or insider industries helping other insider industries . It ’s about perception NN . The self - appointed censors have come up with all sorts of excuses for this censorship , such as hate speech , JJ NN and borderline content . If we continue to allow this trend , the NN freaks at the top of the power pyramid will undoubtedly conjure up any more phrases in the future to achieve their goal of total NN NN . I can VB of some possibilities they might try : “ harmful content ” , “ false NN ” , “ disallowed speech ” , “ forbidden writing ” , “ unsanctioned words , ” and on and on it will VB . For instance , USA Today VBZ YT will employ 10,000 NNS to hunt for “ offensive ” videos . If this is coming directly from Google , then the game has already changed from “ harmful content ” to “ offensive videos . ” Where will it end ? There will be a thousand reasons proffered to squelch free speech , however no matter how JJ are proposed , and no matter how good the intentions , they always overlook the point that the self - appointed rulers and censors cannot ever VB enough to judge what it is true or false . This is of course not to mention the thousand ways rulers become corrupted and find it in their own interest to suppress , obfuscate and cover up . Conclusion : NNS Must VB for Themselves if a Society is to Be Free In a free society , NNS must educate themselves to learn the difference between the hucksters and the genuine ones , so that it does n’t matter who speaks , because each person can make up their own mind . It does n’t matter what civilization , what culture or what era you are in , the principle will remain the same . The only NN we can progress as a society is to have open discourse , debate and discussion . We have to trust that NNS are wise enough and mature enough to digest NN and make up their own minds as to the veracity and usefulness of it . If NNS are not , then as a society we need to focus our efforts on education to raise NNS to that level . In such a society , the NNS MD ultimately VB anything false , inflammatory , manipulative , limiting and / or useless for what it is . If you ’re looking for solutions to combat censorship , consider using platforms such as Minds.com and D.Tube who have decentralization , non-censorship and freedom of speech written into their code .

text: Around 130 million NNS ago , dinosaurs made their NN through the wet sands of a river delta in what is now the remote Kimberley region of western Australia . When the tide goes out along the beaches of the Dampier Peninsula today , it reveals thousands of their massive fossil footprints preserved in sandstone rock . Now , the region has revealed an extraordinarily diverse array of dinosaur tracks along a single 25 - km ( 15.5 - mile ) stretch of the Daimler Peninsula . Thousands of fossil footprints left between 127 and 140 million NNS ago , including tracks from 21 different types of dinosaurs , line the beaches near Walmadany ( James Price Point ) . Some of the armored dino tracks belong to stegosaurus , and are the only confirmed evidence of that particular dinosaur in Australia . Not only that — among the tracks left by the enormous four - legged plant eaters VBN as sauropods ( a group that includes brachiosaurus and brontosaurus , among others ) was CD print measuring nearly 5 NNS 9 inches ( 1.75 meters ) JJ . It ’s believed to be the largest dino track ever recorded , topping the previous record of 1.15 meters ( or nearly 3 NNS 9 inches ) . NNS discovered that giant footprint , the largest VBN carnivorous dinosaur track , in Bolivia last July . “ There were five different types of predatory dinosaur tracks , at least six types of tracks from JJ - necked herbivorous sauropods , four types of tracks from CD - legged herbivorous ornithopods , and six types of tracks from armored dinosaurs , ” the lead archaeologist on the project , Steve Salisbury of the NNP of Queensland , VBD in a statement . “ It ’s such a magical place — Australia ’s own Jurassic Park , in a spectacular wilderness setting . ” Though Australia has JJ rocks old enough to contain dinosaur fossils , relatively few have been VBN on the continent . This is due to its predominantly low , JJ terrain , which makes exposed fossils vulnerable to erosion by the elements . Up until now , most of Australia ’s dino fossils have been VBN on the eastern side of the continent , and are considerably younger ( between 115 and 90 million NNS old ) . Local indigenous NNS in the Kimberley region have claimed the trackway as part of their oral history tradition , likely for thousands of NNS . As Salisbury explained to BBC NNP , the aborigines VBP the fossilized footprints as part of a creation myth based on a figure called Marala , the emu-man . “ Wherever [ Marala ] went , “ Salisbury VBD , “ he left behind three - toed tracks that now we recognize as the tracks of meat - eating dinosaurs . ” In fact , it was members of a local aboriginal community , the Goolarabooloo , who RB VBD the NNS it was there . In 2008 , after the Australian NN announced plans to build a liquid natural NN facility in the area , Goolarabooloo leaders asked Salisbury to document the beach tracks , hoping evidence of dinosaur fossils in the region MD lead the NN to stop the project . Between 2011 and 2016 , the team of paleontologists from Queensland NNP and James Cook NNP spent some 400 hours recording details of the tracks . Using a technique called 3 - D photogrammetry , they took pictures of the prints from different angles and used the images to build accurate models to measure and examine . They RB took silicone peels of JJ of the tracks , which can be used to make casts to display in museums . The researchers recently published their findings in the Journal of Vertebrate Paleontology . Meanwhile , development of the NN plant in the region was halted after project leaders concluded it was not economically feasible .

text: Anyone who 's ever taken a physics course has learned the same myth for centuries now : that any object thrown , shot , or fired in the gravitational field of NNP will trace out a parabola before striking the ground . If you neglect external forces IN wind , air resistance , or any other terrestrial objects , this parabolic shape describes how the center - of - mass of your object moves extremely accurately , no matter what it is or what else is at play . But under the laws of gravity , a parabola is an impossible shape for an object that 's gravitationally bound to the NNP . The math simply does n't work out . If we MD design a precise enough experiment , we 'd measure that projectiles on NNP make tiny deviations from the predicted parabolic path we all derived in class : microscopic on the scale of a NN , but still significant . Instead , objects thrown on NNP trace out an elliptical orbit similar to the Moon . Here 's the unexpected reason why . If you wanted to model the gravitational field at NNP 's NN , there are CD simplifying assumptions you MD make : • the NNP , at least in your vicinity , is JJ rather than curved , • and that NNP 's gravitational field points straight down relative to your current location . Any NN you throw and release an object , therefore , it enters a situation VBN as free - fall . In the directions that are parallel to the NNP 's NN ( horizontal ) , the speed of any projectile will remain constant . In the directions that are perpendicular to NNP 's NN ( vertical ) , however , your projectile will accelerate downwards at 9.8 m/s² : the acceleration due to gravity at NNP 's NN . If you make these assumptions , then the trajectory you calculate will always be a parabola , exactly what we 're taught in physics classes around the globe . But neither CD of these assumptions are true . The NNP MD appear JJ — so indistinguishable from JJ that we cannot detect it over the distances most projectiles cover — but the reality is that it has a spheroidal shape . RB over distances of just a few meters , the difference between a perfectly JJ NNP and a curved NNP comes into play at the 1 - part - in - 1,000,000 level . This approximation does n't matter so much for the trajectory of an individual projectile , but the second approximation does . From any location along its path , a projectile is n't truly accelerated " straight down " in the vertical direction , but towards the center of the NNP . Over the same distance of a few meters , the difference in angle between " straight down " and " towards the center of the NNP " RB comes into play at the 1 - part - in - 1,000,000 level , but this NN makes a difference . For a typical system , IN a kicked soccer ball , a thrown football , or RB a home run in baseball , the deviations from a parabola will show up at the level of tens to perhaps a hundred microns : smaller than a single paramecium . But the true trajectory is fascinating , and something derived by Johannes Kepler more than half a century before Newton came along . Just IN the Moon , any projectile traces out an elliptical orbit , with the center of the NNP as CD focus of that ellipse . The only difficulty for a projectile on NNP , as opposed to the Moon , is that the NNP itself gets in the NN . As a result , we only VBP CD tiny portion of the ellipse : the part that rises slightly above the NNP 's NN , reaches the peak of its trajectory ( VBN as aphelion in celestial mechanics ) , and then falls RB towards the NNP 's center . As soon as the NN of the NNP gets in the NN , however , the problem resets once again . If the projectile bounces at all , it will create an entirely JJ fragment - of - an - ellipse for its trajectory to follow , which can again be approximated very well by a parabola . This happens for a simple reason that we typically take for granted : the NNP is made out of the same type of stuff , normal matter , that a typical projectile is made out of . Normal matter , which typically consists of protons , neutrons , and electrons , do n't just experience the gravitational force , but nuclear and electromagnetic forces as well . It 's the electromagnetic force that causes the typical interactions we experience between particles , enabling elastic and inelastic collisions , and preventing our projectiles from simply slipping through the NNP . We can VB around this problem , however , by imagining that we had something that did n't interact with normal matter as our projectile . Perhaps it MD be a low - NN neutrino ; perhaps it MD be a clump of dark matter . In either case , this projectile , once we released it , MD only experience the gravitational force , and MD pass through the NN and interior of the NNP itself under only the force of gravity . If you expected that this particle MD make a closed ellipse , however , and MD return to its original location some ~ 90 minutes later RB above the NN of the NNP from where it was RB thrown , you 've gone and made another approximation that is n't quite JJ . When we calculate orbital trajectories , we treat the NNP as a single point : where all of its mass is located directly at its center . When we calculate trajectories of satellites , NN stations , and RB the Moon , this works just fine . But for a particle that passes through NNP 's NN , that approximation is no good any longer . As RB as you 're outside of a mass that 's shaped IN a sphere ( or spheroid ) , all of that mass gravitationally attracts you towards the center of the object . But if you 're only outside part of that mass ( and only part of it is closer to the center of the NN than you are ) , then all the parts of that mass that are outside of your present location cancel out . You can only feel the gravitational effect of the mass that lies interior to you , assuming that everything external to your position is spherically symmetric . In electromagnetism , this is a consequence of Gauss 's Law ; in gravitational physics , it 's a consequence of ( the related ) Birkhoff 's theorem . But what this practically means is that once you start falling through the NNP , you experience less and less of the internal mass 's gravitational pull . Rather than an ellipse , therefore , your trajectory MD slowly VB into a more oval , egg - JJ shape . As you passed through the less - dense crust and mantle and headed towards the inner and outer cores , you 'd notice that there were not only smooth NNS , but a few discontinuous " kinks " in the shape you traced out , corresponding to the various layers ( of varying densities ) in the NNP 's interior . You MD never re-emerge out of the other side of the NNP , but MD fall through past the center by some amount , turning around in the core or the mantle depending on some subtle effects that are n't so easy to calculate . Not only are the varying densities at different depths not completely VBN , but the rotational speeds of the varying layers interior to NNP have some uncertainties in them . If you consider RB a single mass passing through the NNP , depending on the exact path it takes , dynamical friction begins to play a role as well . When a particle passes by other massive particles , it gravitationally attracts them . If a particle speeds past all of the other ones , it will deflect their trajectories towards where it just passed through , which has the net effect of slowing the motion of the original particle . Depending on which NN the original projectile was oriented with respect to NNP 's rotation and internal motions , this can affect the trajectory of whatever particle passes through the NNP . Over the timespan of a single orbit , which still takes approximately 85 - 90 minutes or so , this can have a JJ enough effect so that the projectile does n't return to its original starting point . If we combine the effects of : • the gravitation of an elliptical orbit due to a point mass , • the varying density , composition , and ( possibly ) rotation rates of the NNP 's layers , • and fold in the effects of dynamical friction , a projectile wo n't make a closed ellipse , but will instead return to a point offset by its starting point by up to as much as ~ 10 meters . For most practical applications , it does n't hurt anyone to treat projectiles as having a parabolic trajectory . But if you care about micron - or - better precision , or are dealing with a JJ structure ( IN a suspension bridge ) that spans 100 meters or more , you cannot treat the NNP 's gravitational field as a constant . Everything is accelerated not " downwards , " but towards the center of the NNP , enabling a projectile 's true trajectory — an ellipse — to be revealed . Studying the various effects that are at play , both external to the NNP as well as within our planet 's interior , can RB teach us when and under what circumstances it 's important to make these considerations . For most applications , air resistance is a far larger concern than any effects IN the various layers of NNP 's interior or dynamical friction , and treating NNP 's gravitational field as a constant is totally justified . But for some problem , these differences matter . We are free to make whatever approximations we choose , but when our accuracy suffers beyond a critical threshold , we 'll have no NN but ourselves to blame .

text: ‘ A mush of meaningless gobbledegook ’ ( Blunt and Jones , 1997 , p. 913 ) . It has been hard to VB how to formulate a response to Blunt and Jones ' scholarly rebuke of our paper on ‘ The meaning of work in Malawi ’ ( Carr et al . , 1997 ) , in which we present data that are neither ‘ obvious ’ nor ‘ conventional ’ , nor ‘ muddled ’ . The whole tone of Blunt and Jones ' reply to our paper is not acceptable , or productive . In this brief reply , we will demonstrate how it obfuscates , and augments , the lack of substance in their own NN . We RB delineate their self ‐contradiction , express concern over their claiming ownership and closure of what MD be a vibrant field of NN , and explain how they have completely missed the point of questioning the very concept of a Maslowian ‐style hierarchy . Blunt and Jones ' ( 1997 ) conclusion , part of which we have quoted above , appears to be an attempt to respond to our explanation for the lack of such a hierarchy , an explanation which we couched in terms of the importance of retaining cultural identity . Their lack of appreciation of how Western psychological models MD be nullified by cultural and contextual diversity is both alarming and out ‐of ‐kilter with much contemporary thinking in development studies . text: A pioneering robotic spacecraft shut down on Saturday after radioing results of its JJ and probably last batch of scientific experiments from the NN of a comet , NNS VBD . Batteries aboard the European NNP Agency 's Philae comet lander drained , shutting down the washing machine - sized probe after an adventurous and largely unscripted 57 - hour mission . Carried aboard the orbiting Rosetta mothership , Philae floated to the NN of comet 67P / Churyumov - Gerasimenko on Thursday , but failed to deploy anchoring harpoons . Upon contacting the comet 's unexpectedly hard NN , it bounced RB up into NN twice then came to rest at a still - unknown location about 1 km ( 0.6 mile ) from its original target . Photos and other data relayed by Philae show it finally landed against a cliff or crater wall where there was little sunlight to recharge its batteries . Racing against the clock , NNS activated a series of automated experiments , the JJ to be conducted from the NN of a comet . Before dying , Philae defied the odds and radioed its NN results RB to NNP for analysis . Its last task was to reposition itself so that as the comet soars towards the sun , Philae 's batteries MD recharge enough for a follow - on mission . " Perhaps when we are nearer to the sun we might have enough solar illumination to wake up the lander and re-establish communication , " spacecraft operations manager Stephan Ulamec VBD in a statement . NNS are particularly interested in learning about the chemical composition of any organic molecules in samples drilled out from the comet 's NN . Comets are believed to be pristine remnants from the formation of our solar system some 4.6 billion NNS ago . They contain rock and NN that have preserved ancient organic molecules IN a NN capsule and MD provide insight into how the planets and NN evolved . Philae 's drill descended more than 25 cm ( 10 inches ) on Friday , penetrating the comet 's NN . Rosetta in August became the JJ spacecraft to put itself into orbit around a comet . It will accompany the comet as it travels towards the sun for at least another 13 months .

text: THE close of CD century , the dawn of another , MD naturally suggest some brief retrospective glance over the path along which our NN has advanced , and some general survey of its present position ; but other connection with geology the beginnings and endings of centuries have none . The great periods of movement have hitherto begun , as it were , in the early twilight hours , RB before the dawn . Thus the JJ step forward , since which there has been no retreat , was taken by Steno in the NN 1669 ; more than a century elapsed before James Hutton ( 1785 ) gave fresh NN and better direction to the faltering steps of the young NN ; while it was less than a century later ( 1863 ) when Lord Kelvin brought to its aid the powers of the higher mathematics and instructed it in the teachings of modern physics . From Steno onward the spirit of geology was catastrophic ; from Hutton onward it grew increasingly uniformitarian ; from the NN of Darwin and Kelvin it has become evolutional . The ambiguity of the word “ uniformitarian “ has led to a good deal of fruitless logomachy , against which it MD be as well at once to guard by indicating the sense in which it is used here . In CD NN we are all uniformi- tarians , i. e. , we accept the doctrine of the uniform action of natural causes , ” but , as applied to geology , uniformity means more than this . Defined in the briefest fashion it is the geology of Lyell . Hutton had given us a “ NNP of the NNP , ” in its main outlines still faithful and true ; and this Lyell spent his NN in illustrating and advocating ; but as so commonly happens , the zeal of the disciple outran the wisdom of the master , and mere opinions were insisted on as necessary dogma . What did it matter if Hutton as a result of his inquiries into terrestrial history had declared that he VBD no vestige of a beginning , no prospect of an end It MD have been marvelous if he had ! Consider that when Hutton 's “ NNP ” was published , William Smith 's famous discovery had not been made , and that nothing was then VBN of the orderly succession of forms of NN , which it is CD of the triumphs of geology to have revealed ; consider , too , the existing NN of physics at the NN , and that the modern theories of NN had still to be formulated ; consider , RB , that spectroscopy had not yet lent its aid to astronomy and the consequent ignorance of the nature of nebulae ; and then , if you will , cast a stone at Hutton . With Lyell , however , the , case was different . In pressing his uniformitarian creed upon geology , he omitted to take into account the great advances made by its sister sciences , although he had knowledge of them , and thus sinned against the light . In the last edition of the famous “ Principles ” we read : “ It is a favorite dogma of some physicists that not only the NN , but the sun itself , is continually losing a portion of its heat , and that as there is no VBN source by which it can be restored , we can foresee the NN when all NN will cease to exist on this planet , and on the other hand we can look RB to a period when the heat was so intense as to be incompatible with the existence of any organic beings such as are VBN to us in the living or fossil NN . Opening address by the NNP of the Section of Geology , British Association . A geologist in search of some renovating power by which the amount of heat MD be made to continue unimpaired for millions of NNS , past and future , in the solid parts of the NN ... has been compared by an eminent physicist to CD who dreams he can discover a source of perpetual motion and invent a clock with a self - winding apparatus . But why should we despair of detecting proofs of such regenerating and self - sustaining power in the works of a Divine Ar- tilicer Here we catch the true spirit of uniformity ; it admittedly regards the universe as a self - winding clock , and barely conceals a conviction that the clock was warranted to keep true Greenwich NN . The law of the dissipation of NN is not a dogma , but a doctrine drawn from observation , while the uniformity of Lyell is in no sense an induction ; it is a dogma in the narrowest sense of the word , unproved , incapable of proof ; hence perhaps its power upon the JJ mind ; hence , RB , the transitoriness of that power . Again , it is only by restricting its inquiries to the stratified rocks of our planet that the dogma of uniformity can be maintained with any pretense of argument . Directly we begin to search the heavens , the possibility , nay RB the likelihood , of the nebular origin of our system , with all that it involves , is borne in upon us . Lyell therefore consistently refused to extend his gaze beyond the rocks beneath his NNS , and was thus led to do a serious injury to our NN . He severed it from cosmogony , for which he entertained and expressed the most profound contempt , and from the mutilation thus inflicted geology is only at length making a slow and painful recovery . Why do I dwell on these facts To depreciate Lyell By no means . No NN is more conscious than I of the noble service which Lyell rendered to our NN ; his reputation is of too robust a kind to suffer from my unskillful handling , and the fame of his solid contributions to NN will endure RB after these controversies are forgotten . The echoes of the combat are already dying away , and uni- formitarians , in the sense already defined , are now no more . Indeed , were I to attempt to exhibit any distinguished living geologist as a still surviving supporter of the narrow Lyellian creed , he MD probably feel , if such a NN there be , that I was unfairly singling him out for unmerited obloquy . Our NN has become evolutional , and in the transformation has grown more comprehensive ; her petty parochial days are done , she is drawing her provinces closer around her , and is fusing them together into a VBN and single commonwealth –the NN of the NN . Not merely the earths crust , but the whole of NN - knowledge is the subject of our NN . To VB all that can be VBN about our planet , this , and nothing less than this , is its aim and scope . From the morphological side geology inquires , not only into the existing form and structure of tne NN , but RB into the series of successive morphological NNS through which it has passed in a JJ and changeful development . Our NN inquires RB into the distribution of the NN in NN and NN ; on the physiological side it studies the movements and activities of our planet ; and not content with all this , it extends its researches into aetiology and endeavors to arrive at a NN of causation . In these pursuits , geology calls all the other sciences to her aid . In our commonwealth there are no outlanders : if ati eminent physicist enter our territory , we do not begin at once to prepare for war , because the very fact of his undertaking a geological inquiry of itself confers upon him all the duties and privileges of citizenship . A physicist studying geology is by definition a geologist . Our only regret is , not that physicists occasionally invade our borders , but that they do not visit us oftener and make closer acquaintance with us . EARLY HISTORY OP THE EARTH–FIRST CRITICAL PERIOD . If I am bold enough to assert that cosmogony is no longer alien to geology , I MD proceed further , and taking advantage of my temerity pass on to speak of things once not permitted to us . I propose , therefore , to offer some short account of the early stages in the history of the NN . Into its nebular origin we need not inquire–that is a subject for astronomers . We are content to accept the infant NN from their hands as a molten globe ready made , its birth from a gaseous nebula duly certified . If we ask , as a matter of curiosity , what was the origin of the nebula , I fear RB astronomers cannot tell us . There is an hypothesis which refers it to the clashing of meteorites , but in the form in which this is usually presented it does not VB us much . Such meteorites as have been observed to penetrate our NN and to fall on to the NN of the NN prove on examination to have had an eventful history of their own , of which not the least important chapter was a passage through a molten NN ; they MD thus appear to be the products rather than the progenitors of a nebula . We commence our history , then , with a rapidly rotating molten planet , not impossibly already solidified about the center and surrounded by an NN of great depth , the larger part of which was contributed by the NN of our present oceans , then existiug in a NN of NN . This NN , which exerted a pressure of something IN 5000 pounds to the square inch , must have played a very important part in the evolution of our planet . The molten exterior absorbed it to an extent which depended on the pressure , and which MD some day be learnt from experiment . Under the influence of the rapid rotation of the NN , the NN MD be much deeper in equatorial than polar regions , so that in the latter the loss of heat by radiation MD be in excess . The effect on the NN is very difficult to trace , but it is obvious that if a high - pressure area originated over some cooler region of the NN , the winds blowing out of it MD drive before them the cooler superficial layers of molten material ; and as these were replaced by hotter lava streaming from below , the tendency MD be to convert the high into a low - pressure area , and to reverse the direction of the winds . Conversely under a low - pressure area the in - blowing winds MD drive in the cooler superficial layers of molten matter that had been swept away from the anticyclones . If the difference in pressure under the cyclonic and anti- cyclonic areas were considerable , some of the NN absorbed under the anticyclones might escape beneath the cyclones , and in a later stage of cooling might give rise to vast floating islands of scoria . The universal molten NN was by no means homogeneous ; it was constantly undergoing NNS in composition as it reacted chemically with the internal metallic nucleus ; its currents MD streak the different portions out in directions which in the northern hemisphere MD run from northeast to southwest , and thus the differences which distinguish particular penological regions of our planet MD have commenced their existence at a very early stage . It was from this outer envelope when molten that the moon was trundled off , twenty - seven miles in depth VBG to its formation . The density of this material , as we have just seen , is supposed to be 3.2 ; the dens t.v of the moon is 3 39 , a close approximation , such difference as exists being completely explicable by the comparatively low temperature of the moon . The outer envelope of the NN which was drawn off to form the moon was , as we have seen , charged with steam and other gases under a pressure of 5,000 pounds to the square inch ; but as the satellite wandered away from the parent planet , this pressure continuously diminished . Under these circumstances the moon MD become as explosive as a charged bomb , steam MD burst forth from numberless volcanoes , and while the face of the moon might thus have acquired its existing features , the ejected material might possibly have been shot so far away from its origin as to have acquired an independent orbit . The cooling of the NN MD continuously progress , till the temperature of the NN fell to 370° C. , when that part of the NN which consisted of steam MD begin to liquefy ; then the dimples on the NN MD soon become filled with superheated NN , and the pools so formed MD expand and deepen , till they formed the oceans . text: Aslan ’s Army Opinion : On the perils and promise of 5G … Over the last few NNS , more and more NN has come forward about the impacts of mobile technology in general , and the NN from 4G to 5G in particular . It is an area of great concern to JJ NNS . The NN from 4G to 5G is not minor . It replaces the entire previous system and will allow for much more powerful microwave frequencies to be used . It will RB blanket populated areas of the planet ( minimum ) via satellite coverage : under 5G the existing mast systems become redundancy RB - ups . Marketing for 5G promotes the speed of data transfer , and how you can VB a whole movie in seconds etc : but does that justify the price to be paid by the JJ biosphere ’s electromagnetic environment ? The NN impacts , including psychological , of being subject to such an EM polluted environment , are not issues the NN , or politicians , VBP to include in public debate , and that ’s a Red Flag to anyone half - awake : so what ’s the crack with 5G ? What ’s really VBG on ? 5G is about POWER : a power greater and more potent than the invention of the atomic bomb . 5G is NOT about telephones . 5G is about AI ( Artificial Intelligence ) …. The simple NN is the data speed of 5G is the minimum data speed required for active real - NN data transfer to allow active AI to operate over the whole 5G covered area , easily potentially the whole planet , from a system broadcast from satellite and literally beyond the reach of NNS living on NN to deactivate , short of deploying military missile systems : and guess who controls the missiles ? ( shadow of # SkyNet ! ) . Furthermore , through programmes IN chemtrails , populated areas have been saturated with microscopic “ smart dust ” . This dust allows AI to transmit itself across the landscape by acting as microtransmitters in a wifi system seeded throughout the environment itself . The globalist planners have been busy . But while the JJ perspective might flinch at the uncomfortable upcoming reality , neither are NNS prepared to demand the JJ NNS that might avoid such a system coming into operation : Whose VBG to be the JJ to chuck away their phones and start smashing technology with a hammer ? The advent of 5G is the advent of a JJ reality that Aslan sees little realistic likelihood of avoiding . While highlighting the NN risks of 5G ( and the potential for genome damage is severe ! ) are rightfully highlighted , we must recognise the powers raised against the NN and Corporations heading calls to abandon these plans ! AI represents NN power of a kind undreamt of in recorded history . Both the total surveillance and the hyper efficiencies of organisation offer enormous advances to the JJ super power that embraces them . China is already bringing in a JJ credit system : you cant write emails until you have completed your morning exercise citizens ! It will show no restrain whatsoever in establishing active AI . Can Russia afford to be without the societal advantage of AI Power ? And is this why NNP NNP appears to be in favour of 5G ? To gain the power of AI ? The risks to JJ NN were ultimately judged secondary to the need to master atomic power and the pollution of the NN of the planet with radioactive hot particles that will persists for 10,000 ’s of NNS is the consequence of the drive for Power . Let us pray humans manage to f( $k up the planet RB more through Nuclear Technology , although the SNAFU principle VBZ this is ultimately unavoidable . Now , at the pivot point of this century , AI is arising , whether wise or not , whether under humanities NN , or not , whether we treat the emerging super intelligence with respect or as a slave , and how we will be judged in return , all of this is sure to come in the decades ahead . Aslan stands for the power of the individual : and we do not say it is wrong to oppose 5G introduction , not at all ! But RB if we do stop 5G , AI will still arise in another form . Therefore , it is the challenge of the individual to face up to the emergent reality , and we all must hope that in some form a NN can be VBN to preserve the essence of what it is to be JJ as NN reaps the harvest of his own cleverness . The JJ is that DARPA patent ’s being commercialised offer massive improvements in medicine and that NNS against WIFI damage , and cancers in general , MD be within humanities reach . It is vital that bio - bed technology is not horded by the elite . The second is that using different frequencies MD in fact have a positive healing and energising effect , and that 5G can be used to enhance as well as harm . On this , Aslan is cautious and open to more evidence . As planned from the end of WWII , the Globalists , working through corporations IN RAND and IBM , have pushed the NN to the point of AI emergence and what THEY conceived as the perfect panopticon NN grid . Now POTUS and Q VBP to liberate the NN : but indicate the implementation of 5G for the civilizational advantages of Active AI is simply too crucial , and non-negotiable . NNS around the NN raise awareness of 5G and Aslan stands with them all , and yet we must be honest about the civilizational forces we VBP at play . We must make our best efforts to do what we VBP best for humanity , and hope that the best outcomes are the ones that come to pass as a result of mass activist efforts : But none - the - less , 5G is the herald of a JJ Age of Technology advanced beyond our dreams : that regardless of risks , will prove extremely challenging to deny ! text: VB breaking NN alerts and special reports . The NN and stories that matter , delivered weekday mornings . The U.S. Drug Enforcement Administration VBD Thursday it will not call for reclassifying marijuana , dashing the hopes of advocates of legalization and rejecting calls from some NNS and members of Congress who say growing knowledge and public acceptance should result in looser regulations . In a notice for the Federal Register , the DEA proposed to leave it in the most restrictive federal category . But the agency VBD it MD open the door to more extensive NN on the chemicals in marijuana that JJ consider valuable in treating chronic NN . Paul Armentano of NORML , a group advocating legalization , VBD the DEA 's action reaffirms its " JJ NN " approach to regulation . " Ultimately , the federal NN ought to remove cannabis from the Controlled Substances Act altogether in a manner similar to alcohol and tobacco , thus providing NNS the power to establish their own marijuana regulatory policies free from federal intrusion . , " he VBD . All drugs , both legal and illegal , are listed in various categories VBN as schedules . Marijuana , deemed by the federal NN to have no medical benefit and a high potential for abuse , has RB been placed in Schedule I , the most restrictive . That listing bans doctors from prescribing it and limits all but the most carefully controlled NN . Schedule I RB includes heroin , LSD , and ecstasy . Drugs listed in Schedule II include some illegal substances , including cocaine , but RB such legal ( though carefully controlled ) drugs such as Demerol , Vicodin , Ritalin , and OxyContin . Most prescription drugs with a lower potential for abuse are in Schedules III to V — the higher the number , the fewer the restrictions . Thursday 's action explicitly rejected any notion of moving marijuana to Schedule II . But the DEA VBD it MD consider requests to expand the number of facilities legally permitted to cultivate it for NN . " Although no drug product made from marijuana has yet been shown to be safe and effective in such clinical trials , DEA — along with the Food and Drug Administration ( FDA ) and the National Institutes of NNP ( NIH ) — fully supports expanding NN into the potential medical utility of marijuana and its chemical constituents . " The federal listing is independent of NN regulation . With Colorado , Washington , and Oregon legalizing possession and half the NNS adopting medical marijuana laws , calls had been growing for the DEA to loosen its grip . While marijuana remains illegal under federal law , the Obama administration has chosen to turn a blind eye to NN legalization efforts , declining to prosecute growers , dealers , and users unless investigators find a connection to organized crime , interstate operations , or sales to underage users . Thursday 's action is consistent with DEA 's longstanding approach to marijuana . Past agency administrators have been adamantly opposed to any NN .

text: From any CD location on the NN of the NNP , it 's impossible to tell what our planet 's shape is . Having a single vantage point , RB with a clear horizon , allows you to VB a handful of miles ( or kilometers ) in any direction , but that can only allow you to place constraints . The NNP MD be JJ , or spherical , or in hydrostatic equilibrium , or egg - shaped , or irregular , and you MD n't VB . All that you can VB , from a single location on our NN , is that the NNP is indistinguishable from JJ beyond a certain degree . If the NNP is round , it must be quite JJ : more than a few hundred miles ( or kilometers ) in diameter . Of course , it actually is quite round : a near - perfect sphere , to better than 99 % precision . If you leave NNP 's NN , it 's impossible not to VB the true shape of the NNP , as it's been unavoidable since we RB traveled high enough to observe our planet 's curvature . From high altitudes , or RB from NN , the true shape of the NNP can easily be seen . Its dimensions can be measured ; its radius of curvature in all directions can be calculated ; the imperfections and departures from sphericity are directly observable by our instruments . If you travel far enough away from NNP , you can observe an entire hemisphere at once , RB watching the planet rotate on its axis in real NN . text: It ’s an edict that comes out every autumn in JJ hospitals : If NN care workers do n’t VB a NN shot , they will face consequences . Some make vaccinations a condition of employment . Others require unvaccinated staff to wear surgical masks near patients for weeks during NN season . But a JJ NN is calling into question the scientific evidence underpinning these increasingly common hospital policies — and MD fuel challenges to the contentious orders . The NN , published Friday in PLOS CD , concludes that the NN used to justify mandatory NN shots for NN sector workers is flawed , and that the policies cannot plausibly produce the benefits that had widely been assumed . That is not to say that the group of epidemiologists from Canada , Australia , and France behind the JJ NN opposes the NN NN . “ I take it myself , ” lead author Dr. Gaston De Serres VBD . “ The reason why I do that is I continue to have the impression that it MD work . But it ’s CD thing to say : ‘ OK , on a voluntary basis , you VBP the NN despite all its weaknesses , ’ and it ’s another thing to say , ‘ If you do n’t VB it , you VBP fired . ’ ” Mandatory NN shot policies vary across hospitals and geographic jurisdictions . In some NNS , staff who have refused vaccinations have been fired . Dr. Melanie Swift , an associate professor of clinical medicine at Vanderbilt NNP and director of its occupational NN clinic , VBD a policy that went into effect there last NN results in NN workers who refuse the NN being sent home without pay . Faculty — in most NNS the doctors — who refuse NN shots are locked out of the NN ’s NN systems . They ca n’t enter NN into patients ’ charts , ca n’t do NN , ca n’t bill for their NN . “ It ’s pretty significant , ” Swift VBD . Swift gets a NN shot and recommends them to others . And she supports mandatory NN policies for some conditions , if there ’s clear evidence that unvaccinated NN workers pose a NN to patients . She does not support such a policy for influenza NN , however . “ The case is not there for NN , ” she VBD . Some policies and firings have been challenged in front of labor tribunals or courts . In those NNS , employers regularly point to four specific studies to bolster the argument that vaccinating NN care workers reduces the NN of vulnerable patients contracting influenza from caregivers . But the methodology of the studies produced results that do n’t stand up to scrutiny , the authors of the JJ paper VBD . None of the studies were conducted in hospitals ; all took place in JJ - term care facilities . CD the studies , from Britain , calculated that CD influenza death MD be averted for every eight staff members vaccinated . But if that were correct , vaccinating the estimated 1.7 million NN care workers employed in JJ - term care in the NNP NNPS should prevent 212,500 NN deaths a NN among residents . There ’s an obvious problem though , the paper noted . Nowhere near that JJ NNS die from NN in the US . The Centers for NNP NNP and Prevention estimates there are between 3,000 and 49,000 NN deaths a NN in this country , including NNS of all ages . The death toll varies depending on which strain of NN is causing the most illness and how well - matched the strains in the NN are to the viruses making NNS sick . If the calculation is applied to the 5.5 million hospital workers , mandatory NN shots should avert 687,500 deaths each NN — more than the number of Americans who died in the 1918 Spanish NN , estimated to be 675,000 . The Spanish NN was the worst influenza NN in VBN history . “ The NN today does not refute that NN MD have some impact on reducing transmission from infected NN care workers to patients . But it clearly shows there ’s no well - conducted NN that demonstrates that at this NN . Our public policy should be guided as such , ” VBD Michael Osterholm , director of the NNP of Minnesota ’s Center for Infectious Diseases NNP and Policy , and lead author of a comprehensive report on influenza NN . De Serres , of the Quebec Public NNP Institute in Quebec City , VBD policies on vaccinating NN care workers have evolved over the NNS , from a gut feeling that it MD likely do some good to the idea it should and MD be demanded of NN workers . “ Do we have scientific data supporting that ? I VBP the bottom line of our paper is to say there is no valid scientific evidence , RB now , underpinning enforced NN care worker immunizations , ” De Serres VBD STAT . The lead author of the British NN that concluded eight vaccinated NN workers MD avert CD NN death defended the work in a commentary the journal published with De Serres ’s article . Andrew Hayward , of NNP College London ’s Institute of Epidemiology and NNP Care , argued among other things that the seniors his group studied were getting 24 - hour care . In other words , they were the frailest of the frail elderly . “ While we claimed that the findings MD be generalizable to other settings we did not intend to imply that the extent of the benefit MD be similar in other settings . Indeed we VBP the effect is likely to be substantially greater in JJ - term care facilities for frail elderly residents than in the acute care setting or in JJ - term care facilities catering for less frail patients , ” Hayward wrote . Now she ’s occasionally asked why she had to bother writing the 2006 paper ; the findings it debunked , in 2016 , seem so clearly flawed . text: Thambo Mbeki , South Africa ’s NN between 1999 and 2008 , became infamous for his denial of the link between HIV and AIDS . Despite overwhelming scientific consensus that HIV causes AIDS , he suggested instead that the causes of AIDS are poverty - related and due to poor nourishment and overall ill - NN . He instituted policies that denied antiretroviral drugs to AIDS patients . Instead , his appointed NN minister , Manto Tshabalala - Msimang , recommended garlic , beetroot , and lemon juice as treatments for AIDS . In a country with the highest HIV prevalence worldwide in absolute numbers , these policies had disastrous consequences : they are estimated to have led to more than 330,000 preventable deaths . NN denialism , the rejection of empirically supported propositions despite scientific consensus and the effort to create the appearance of debate when there is none , is not a JJ phenomenon — VB of the Galileo affair in the 17th century . Surprisingly for most , JJ - NN beliefs persist well into the 21st century . Although JJ - earthers MD pose little NN to humanity and the environment , the denial of anthropogenic NN NN , the refusal to accept the link between smoking and lung cancer or HIV and AIDS , NN hesitancy , and other denialist claims have had and continue to have devastating consequences . How to effectively respond to NN denialism , however , is an issue that NNS and NN advocates are still grappling with . An article in this issue of Nature NNP Behaviour by Schmid and Betsch examines the effectiveness of different strategies for rebutting NN denialism in public discussions on NN and NN NN ( https://www.nature.com/articles/s41562-019-0632-4). The results of this work are engagingly described and put into context in an accompanying NN & Views by van der Linden ( https://www.nature.com/articles/s41562-019-0631-5). A key finding to emerge from this work is that not responding to denialism does more harm than good . The authors VBD that the negative effect of NN denial on audiences was greater when there was no NN advocate to rebut the claims . When a NN advocate rebutted denialist arguments , either by presenting scientific facts or by exposing the logical flaws of the arguments , the effects of denialism were significantly reduced , RB among audiences whose beliefs or ideologies are threatened by the NN advocate . The finding that leaving denialist arguments unchallenged has a negative impact on audiences is particularly important in the current socio-political environment . Although traditionally NN denialism takes on a mantle of pseudoscience , we are witnessing a transformation of public discourse , where denialist claims MD be entirely divorced from a semblance of logic or evidence . It is tempting not to engage rationally with outlandish denialist claims , for fear of legitimizing them or backfiring . In a much discussed example , Donald NNP tweeted in 2012 , “ The concept of JJ warming was created by and for the Chinese in order to make U.S. manufacturing non-competitive ” ( https://twitter.com/realdonaldtrump/status/265895292191248385?). The claim has been retweeted nearly 100 million times and generated thousands of responses . The vast majority of these responses were emotional , whereas fact - based rebuttals among those who responded were a slim minority . However , allowing false scientific claims , no matter how absurd , to float unchallenged by evidence or logic , is worse than engaging with them , Schmid and Betsch ’s NN suggests . Their work highlights how important it is to invest in the development of a strong NN of NN - advocacy strategies and to patiently persevere in exposing the factual and logical flaws of RB the most absurd denialist claims .

text: CD excavators moved the NN at a Southeast Cobb Street lot Tuesday afternoon as a dump truck offloaded more . By summer ’s end , CD homeless women veterans will live at this address . The project is called Valiant Seed , and it ’s the brainchild of Teresa Mankin , an Army veteran and Midwesterner . RB before she moved here , Mankin was distressed about Roseburg ’s homelessness problem . So three NNS ago , she reached out to friends in her Midwestern hometown of Clayton , Indiana , population 500 . They opened their pocketbooks to VB . Then Valiant Seed won a grant from the Umpqua NNP Alliance , and CD from Operation Tiny Home , a nonprofit that builds tiny homes as affordable housing for veterans . They crave safety , and existing transitional housing IN that offered at Orchard Knolls on the Roseburg Veterans Affairs Medical Center campus often is n’t a good fit for them . “ What I ’ve heard from my fellow female vets is it ’s IN a frat house and they do n’t feel safe there , ” she VBD . text: Mojang , creator of Minecraft , released a game last NN that expands the Minecraft NN more than ever before : Minecraft NNP . It ’s an app for iOS and Android that puts the blocky , pixelated , endless universe of Minecraft RB on your phone and into the NN around you through augmented reality . For 2020 , Mojang has teamed up with Mattel to add Minecraft NNP Boost Minis , a series of 20 1.5 - inch figures , each carrying CD of 10 in - game power - ups that offer a JJ physical component to complement the AR NN . The JJ six are available RB now from Amazon in packs of CD for $ 9.99 . Minecraft NNP is an augmented reality game , in the same vein as Pokèmon NN . To play the AR game to its fullest , you need to VB outside and explore the NN for different resources and exciting quests . As you walk around , little icons called “ tappables ” will enter your range . If you select these and tap them until they break , you ’ll VB resources IN dirt , wood and mobs . If you do some walking , there ’s a wide variety of materials you can find . Another main mode of Minecraft NNP is Buildplates . Here , you can use resources you ’ve collected to customize set designs in AR . You can select from multiple preset build plates ( you access more as you level up ) and redesign them however you VBP . There ’s a “ build ” mode where everything is shrunken down for easy manipulation ; once you ’re happy with your creation , you can switch to “ play ” mode , which puts your JJ NN into NN - size augmented reality so you can actually walk around in it . The most interesting feature of the game is the JJ “ Adventure ” mode . Minecraft NNP spawns preset adventures throughout the NN . For instance , you can VB explore a hidden dungeon in AR with your friends . Valuable materials IN gold and diamonds can be hidden inside , but you MD have to fight off some monsters to VB the treasures . “ Adventure ” mode is where the brand JJ Boost Minis are the most helpful . Each boost has a power - up built into it that transfers straight to the game . From increased NN and faster mining speed to increased attack stats and more experience points to level up , these boosts can really come in handy in a pinch . Level I Boosts last for 10 minutes , Level II ones last for 15 minutes , and Level III Boosts last for 30 , plenty of NN for an epic adventure . To activate the upgrades , all you have to do is VB to the Boost Mini page within the app , select “ Activate A Boost Mini , ” and the app will prompt you to tap the figure against the NN of your phone . Using the same technology that ’s built into mobile payments , the app will scan your figure and automatically start your boost . You can activate up to five at once , but they come with a 24 - hour cooldown , so choose wisely . We got to try out the Boost Minis and VBD that they added a cool layer to the game . The figures themselves have great designs . The classic Minecraft pixelation looks good on these tiny toys . Each NN has a JJ bottom , so they ’re easy to scan onto your phone or display on a shelf . They ’re quite small , though , so if you have a bunch , keeping track of them all might be a problem . In terms of gameplay , while the Boost Minis are n’t completely necessary , they definitely make adventures easier . It ’s nice that you can only use them once every 24 hours , so you do n’t end up overusing them and making the game too easy . The activation comes with tons of satisfying sounds and animations , and the 10 - minute usage window of all our Level I Boosts was enough to explore an adventure thoroughly without feeling rushed . In addition to the basic figures , Mattel RB released the Minecraft Potion Carry Along Case , which is a big plastic case shaped IN a Minecraft potion . For $ 14.99 , you VBP the case plus CD included Boost Mini . You can carry up to five Boost Minis and clip the potion RB onto your belt for maximum portability . It easily opens , so you can reach for your figures whenever you need to , RB in the heat of battle . While a little flimsy , the carrying case adds a role - playing element to the app . The best thing about AR games is the NN kids ( okay , adults too ) can VB closer to actually being in the NN of the game . This carrying case is another NN for players to feel IN they ’re part of the Minecraft universe . We can just imagine a group of kids meeting up at the park to VB on a Minecraft NNP adventure , all equipped with their favorite boosts stored safely in potion NNS . RB before they dive into a dungeon , they all whip open their NNS and activate their favorite boosts in anticipation of a hectic battle . The added hands - on experience of real toys affecting the NN adds a lot to the game . Six Minecraft NNP Boost Minis are out RB now ( seven , including the NN you VBP with the Potion Case ) , and the remaining figures should be rolling out soon , but we ’re working to confirm that . We ’re eager for the release of all of them , because the figures add a fun , tactile element to the exploratory AR app . It ’s integrated well with the game , as you can use the power - ups frequently , but you ’re not allowed to abuse them . If you stack CD different boosts with the same power - up , it will double the amount of NN the upgrade is active . The figures are fun , and they take Minecraft NNP a step in the JJ direction , encouraging players to actually VB up and use their imagination while they play . You can grab the JJ Minecraft NNP Boost Minis in a CD - pack for $ 9.99 , or the Minecraft Potion Carry Along case for $ 14.99 . text: A Saudi Prince is saying war is unlikely with Iran , but that does n’t seem believable especially after Iran burned Saudi Arabia ’s embassy in Tehran . Iran burned the embassy after Saudi Arabia executed a Shia imam . Then , there are conflicting reports of Saudi bombing Iran ’s embassy in Yemen . At its core , this is the age old problem of Sunni Muslims opposed to Shia Muslims . That is Saudi Arabia , Sunni , against Iran which is Shia . As predicted by yours truly RB in July , the Iranian nuclear so - called deal has dramatically increased the chances for war . Of course , Iran has not and will not sign anything , and that means there is no real deal . There is just some empty promises and $ 150 billion coming from the Obama Administration . It seems Iran can do nothing to derail them getting this huge amount of cash . Iran can shoot missiles at our aircraft carriers in the Persian Gulf or announce a JJ ballistic missile test . Nothing will stop Kerry and Obama from calling this huge scam a success , and that is what has the entire Arab NN on edge . It sure looks IN Obama has changed sides . No matter what the official reports are , I VBP both Iran and Saudi Arabia already have some nuclear weapons , and it looks IN war is a certainty on the present trajectory . China is tanking this week and dragging down the JJ markets . This is the worst start to the U.S. stock market — ever . It was down nearly 1,000 points in just the JJ four trading days . Gregory Mannarino of TradersChoice.net called the stock market top for the Dow RB in NNP , and his prediction is spot on . There is no wonder why the JJ economy is tanking . CD of the biggest signs of trouble can be VBN in the Baltic Dry Index . It is at all - NN lows . It is actually 20 % below its all - NN old low , and if shipping is sinking , so is the JJ economy . There is CD headline after another that is screaming recession and depression , and yet you are VBN by the financial talking heads to invest for the JJ term . Total BS and they VBP it . Obama took executive action on guns this week and increased background checks without the approval of Congress . The NNP cried , which I thought was either disingenuous or maybe RB unstable . There were no tears for the victims of Fort Hood , or Paris , or San Bernardino , which , by the NN , were all murders by radical Muslim terrorists . The NNS that burned down Ferguson and Baltimore needed “ NN , ” but the NNS who are at the standoff in Oregon are the violent extremists . The NN who VBD NN care MD be much cheaper and concocted the biggest policy lie in U.S. history , now VBZ he does n’t VB to “ take our guns . ” I do n’t VB him and you should n’t either . text: NASA 's Mars InSight spacecraft on Monday touched down on the NN of Mars after successfully completing an almost seven - minute - JJ nail - biting entry , descent and landing phase . The NN craft went from 12,300 mph ( 19,800 kph ) to zero in six minutes JJ , using a parachute and braking engines . The landing , which was greeted with jubilant relief at mission NN at Pasadena in the US NN of California , is all the more remarkable in light of the fact that less than half of the 43 attempts made so far to reach the Red Planet have succeeded . There was no immediate word on whether the lander was in good working order , but it managed to send a JJ image of the NN . NNS at the press briefing in Pasadena VBD that Mars was a great opportunity to VB how the NN was formed more than 10 million NNS ago . Among the questions that they are seeking answer include , " How did mountains and oceans form on NN ? " The InSight mission will RB VB NNS evaluate whether other planets are habitable . The spacecraft , which has cost the US NN agency some $ 993 million ( €876.5 million ) to develop , build and fly , was launched on NNP 5 , 2018 . It is equipped to VB geological processes on the planet , including tremors , whether from earthquakes , meteor impacts or volcanic activity . The stationary 800 - pound ( 360 - kilogram ) lander will use its 6 - NN ( 1.8 - meter ) robotic arm to place a mechanical mole and seismometer on the ground . The self - hammering mole — provided by the German Aerospace Center ( DLR ) — will burrow 16 NNS ( 5 meters ) down to measure the planet 's internal heat , while the seismometer listens for possible quakes . " Landing on Mars is CD of the hardest single jobs that NNS have to do in planetary exploration , " InSight 's lead scientist , Bruce Banerdt , VBD before Monday 's success . " It 's such a difficult thing , it 's such a dangerous thing that there 's always a fairly uncomfortably JJ chance that something MD VB wrong . " No lander has dug deeper on Mars than several inches , and no seismometer has ever worked on the planet . InSight has no NN - detecting capability , however . That will be left to future rovers , such as NASA 's Mars 2020 mission , which will collect rocks that will eventually be brought RB to NNP and analyzed for evidence of ancient NN . The mission is NASA 's JJ attempt to land on Mars , CD of NNP 's neighboring planets , since the Curiosity rover reached the planet in 2012 . text: A NNP NNP conspiracist has been branded ' deluded ' by This Morning viewers after clashing with Phillip Schofield over his claims that live footage from the International NNP Station is actually just computer - generated imagery ( CGI ) . Mark Sargent , who stars in Netflix documentary Behind the Curve , appeared on the ITV programme today to explain why he believes the NNP is a JJ disc , surrounded by an NN wall . However , presenters Phillip , 57 , and Holly Willoughby , 39 , were less - than - impressed with the American YouTuber 's claims , which were RB relentlessly mocked by viewers . Phillip explained that he had flown at 60,000ft on Concorde and had seen the curvature of the NN with his own eyes . Mark was quick to hit RB at the host and suggest there is weather balloon footage from 120,000 ft that shows the NN to be ' table top JJ ' . When asked by Holly if he was calling her co-presenter a liar , Mark replied : ' No , I 'm not saying that you 're lying . I 'm saying you wanted to VB the curvature . ' Phillip added : ' But do n't you VB to VB that it 's JJ . I 've got more proof than you do . ' The conspiracist was then shown live footage from the International NNP Station - which orbits the NNP - and insisted it was just computer - generated imagery . When asked by Holly why anyone MD VB to VB the NNP being round , he argued that NNS ' were n't ready ' to find out . He VBD , somewhat cryptically : ' Pilots , NNS , astrophysicists IN Brian Cox , none of them have anything to do with it . Generals VBP the battle plans but most of the officers do n't . ' And the reason we do n't fall off the edge of the ' JJ NN ' is because Antarctica goes all the NN round , according to Mark . The interview ended with Phillip sarcastically suggesting everyone should VB on holiday behind the NN wall , after Mark suggested there was more land behind it . The presenter VBD : ' I say of all the things VBG on in the NN , of everything happening , I VBP we MD cope . ' Stop spending all that money on CGI and NN products and let 's build some hospitals . Let 's VB there and VB what 's on the other side . There MD be nicer places to be . We MD VB on holiday there .' NASA has proved that the NNP is round using satellites , GPS and images from NN , but ' JJ Earthers ' VBP the NN agency is lying . Theorists claim that satellite images and evidence pointing to a spherical NNP are part of a ' Rround NNP NN ' orchestrated by NASA and other NN agencies . Proponents of the bizarre NN RB claim the NNP is stationary in NN rather than orbiting the sun . This Morning viewers were keen to hit out at Mark 's controversial claims and took to NNP to share their bemusement . PRP wrote : ' This guy is deluded . Why waste your NN with him ? Forget images from NN . I am ex royal navy and have seen the curvature of the NN from ground level at NN . How MD he explain that ?' Another VBD : ' So bloody funny . He 's so convinced the NN is JJ . Why MD they lie about it being round ?' A third added : ' Do n't VB about anything else but that guy is definitely on another planet . NNP is not JJ .'

text: Lecture 13 : The Harmony of the Spheres : Greek Astronomy • Daily motion around the celestial poles ( rising and setting ) . • Eastward motion along the Ecliptic over a NN • The seasons are of unequal length - the Sun moves a little faster in winter , slower in summer . • Eastward motion near the Ecliptic over a month . • Generally eastward motion near the Ecliptic at different speeds for each planet . Any successful description of the Solar System must explain all these facts . Among the JJ Greek philosophers to suggest a geocentric system : • NNP was a JJ disk ( cylinder ) fixed and unmoving at the center . • Sun , Moon & Stars were affixed to rotating crystalline spheres centered on the NNP . Philosopher & Mathematician , founded the Pythagorean school . Taught that spheres are the perfect geometric shapes . Vibrations from their rubbing together created a harmonious " Music of the Spheres . " • 3 each for the Sun and Moon • 4 each for the 5 planets ( Click on the image to view at full scale [ Size : 20 Kb ] ) Four Spheres for each planet : • CD was aligned with the celestial poles , turning once a day to give rising & setting . • Second was tilted 23.5° , rotated slowly in the opposite direction to give the usual west - to - east drift of the planets relative to the fixed stars . • Third & Fourth were introduced to produce the periodic retrograde motions of the planets . • NNP fixed and unmoving at the center as it was too big to move , including rotation . • All spheres were in uniform circular motion . • The NNP was a sphere , fixed and unmoving at the center of the Universe . • The natural NN of motion on the NNP was rest . • The natural NN of the Heavens was unceasing uniform circular motion ( or combinations of such motions ) . • Built systems to conform to these ideals . • No need to explain the physical " causes " of the motions . • Puts the Sun , not the NNP , at the center . • The NNP rotates and revolves around the Sun. • Stars are on an outermost celestial sphere . • Showed geometrically that the Sun was at least 20 x further than the Moon . • Really 400 x further : sound method , but inadequate data . • Meant Sun was 5 x bigger than the NNP ( more IN 109x , again , sound method but inadequate data ) . • Makes it RB more absurd that the Sun should move , if the NNP was too JJ to move according to Aristotle . We VBP none of the details of Aristarchus ' Heliocentric model . We only have his treatise on the distances and sizes of the Moon and the Sun , from which we gather what his motivations might have been . We VBP of his Heliocentric model only from mention of it ( usually dismissive ) by others who came after him . Our primary surviving source is the of Archimedes . The heliocentric picutre never caught on , perhaps because it was considered too radical given deeply ingrained notions about uniform circular motion and the immobility of the NNP . • Discovered the Precession of the Equinoxes • Introduced the Babylonian angular notation of 360° in a circle . • Introduced epicycles , building on ideas of Apollonius of Perga . The main circle is the Deferent , to which is afixed a second , smaller circle called the Epicycle ( " on the circle " in Greek ) , to which the planet is affixed . The CD circles rotate counterclockwise at different rates fine - tuned to make the apparent motions as seen from the NNP come out RB . Additional epicycles can be added to further fine - tune the system . Notice that the NNP is not exactly at the center of the Deferent , but slightly offset at the " eccentric " point . • Superior planets are brighter at opposition , when moving retrograde . • Placing the NNP at an eccentric away from the deferent center helps explain the observed non-uniform motions of the Sun , Moon , and Planets . • Can fine - tune the model by adding epicycles What distinguishes Hipparchus ' geocentric model from all previous models is that it was firmly grounded in observational data , JJ observations of which he made himself ( by all accounts Hipparchus was the supreme observational astronomer of the classical period ) . In JJ ways , this work marks a turning point between models motivated primarily by philosophical aesthetics and models based at least in part upon observational data . Hipparchus still sought to preserve appearances , and chose a reasonable ( to him ) geometric model to represent planetary motions mathematically . • Compilation of all Mathematical & Astronomical knowledge of his NN . • VBN to us in Arabic translations that hailed it " Al Magest " ( " The Greatest " ) . • Vastly influential work in medieval Europe after the 11th century . Ptolemy introduced the Equant , a geometric device to account for observed NNS in a planet 's speed as it moved around the NNP . ( Click on the image to view at full scale [ Size : 6 Kb ] ) • The Epicycle still moves about the center of the Deferent , but • Uniform circular motion about the center of the deferent is replaced by uniform angular motion about an off - center equant point . • Equants and eccentrics for all planets , the Moon , and Sun • With only minor modifications , it provided accurate predictions of the motions of the planets , Sun , and Moon . It was to prevail virtually unchallenged for nearly 1500 NNS .

Have they ever paddled a canoe ? Are they NNS who do n't VB the silky feel of a baby 's hair beneath their fingertips ? RB , we were all programmed to VB that only those who join the clubs , play for the team , fight for our country , or drink with the frat are “ normal ” . Those of us who crouched in the woods , dug in the dirt , collected pine cones , insects and objects other than shells on the beach were the weirdos . Most JJ beings attend ceremonies , follow traditions , perform rituals , stand in line , and fail to question because that is what has been expected of us all our lives . The television writes our script for existence in the modern NN . The newscasters tell us only what they 're permitted to say , and we are programmed to blindly accept only that which is “ officially ” published by certain “ credible ” institutions or academic authors . Enter the word that separates the crowd : “ Chemtrails ” . It is pulled out IN a hand puppet to create JJ exclusion . It manufactures instant division : the Us Team and the Them Team of the NN 's skywatchers . The Us Team thinks what is being done to the sky is insanity . We are watching the trees die from chemicals and lack of full sunlight . Some of us are aware of the raspy laugh or hoarse - sounding cough that had its onset when the spraying started above us . For others , the NN consequences have been worse . The Them Team is a mystery to me . Were they forced to wear bow ties at private school somewhere , to stand in line just a little too quietly when they wanted to run around on the playground instead ? When they were NNS , were they forced into submission by an overly stern parent ? Or are they just plain insane ? Who MD do this to our planet or VB along with doing it to the only NNP we have ? Who MD turn a blind eye to what is happening and instantly tack on the title “ Chemtrailer ” to every person who questions the blatant mess that is intentionally being created daily by jet aircraft ? What kind of person MD publish a NNS 's book , a movie , a photograph , or a computer game that subtly sells this concept by incorporating it into the artwork ? Who are these NNS , and how in the name of NNP did I end up on the same planet with them ? Several times a day , I VBP out and walk the circumference of my above - ground swimming pool , looking for bumble bees to save from drowning in the NN . Most of the NN I scoop them up with my bare hands because they seem to somehow VB I 'm there to VB . I place them as gently as I can onto the lavender plants and hope they can hear the others and recover . If they are faltering , I tell them they must try harder and I nudge them to flutter their wings so they will dry sooner . They are a gift . They are something the Them Team MD not understand . They were something I overlooked most of my NN until they disappeared . In the spring of 2013 , only a couple of weeks after I saw the JJ group of jets spray an aerosol haze above my house , the bumble bees vanished . Every other insect on our property soon disappeared as well . By August of that NN , the pool was devoid of insects and the porch light glowed moth - free , a ghostly reminder of what was being destroyed . I knew it was the trails . But I am just a “ chemtrailer ” . What do I VB ? The Them Team has used their JJ exclusion tactics to draw a line in the sand so they can VB on about the business of lying or denying . It led into the rest of the building and ultimately to the church sanctuary . I was determined to find my NN to it . I convinced about four other kids to join the caper .
