text: " They [ penguins ] are charismatic , endearing and in serious trouble , " warned NBC ’s Anne Thompson on the Dec. 12 , 2007 , " Nightly NNP . " Thompson did n’t include any disagreement . While the networks had plenty of NN to worry about the future of birds , most network NN shows did n’t take much NN to include any other point of view RB though hundreds of NNS have expressed skepticism of manmade NN NN NN . Another NBC reporter , Kerry Sanders , hyped the threat of warming to polar bears and walruses on Dec. 9 , 2007 , " a NN NNS say MD melt away by 2050 . " Sanders did n’t include any NNS who disagreed with that claim . The lack of balance on the issue prompted CD network journalist , John Stossel of ABC , to do a NN on the NN ’s CD - sidedness on “ 20/20 ” Oct. CD , 2007 . “ You ’ve heard the reports . The globe is warming . And it ’s our fault . And the consequences will be terrible . But you should VB there is another side to this NN , ” teased Stossel as he began his “ Give me a Break ” segment . There is another side to the issue . In CD NN , Stossel interviewed four NNS critical of the so - called “ consensus ” on JJ warming . That ’s four more dissenting NNS than CBS put on its network in six entire months . To better assess network behavior on this key topic , the Business & NNP Institute examined 205 stories from ABC , CBS and NBC that mentioned " JJ warming " or " NN NN " between July 1 , 2007 , and Dec. 31 , 2007 . BMI VBD skepticism was shut out of a vast majority of reports . Overall , a measly 20 percent had any dissent at all referenced by a journalist or guest . Skeptical voices were suppressed by the networks , outnumbered by nearly a 7 - to - 1 ratio by those promoting fear of NN NN or being used by the network for the same purpose . CBS had an RB worse record : nearly 38 proponents to CD skeptic . Lengthy segments IN Scott Pelley ’s Oct. 21 , 2007 , " 60 Minutes " NN on " The Age of Megafires " certainly had NN to include an alternative point of view to the notion that JJ warming is largely responsible for bigger , hotter fires in the American West . But Pelley skipped those voices – voices IN a NNP of California Merced professor published on the Washington Spokesman - Review Web site about the California wildfires . According to Alan Zarembo’s Oct. 24 , 2007 , NN , “ NNS VBD it MD be difficult to make that case , given the combustible mix of drought and wind that has plagued the region for centuries or more . ” Anthony Westerling , a UC - Merced professor and NN scientist , VBD Zarembo that the wildfires were the result of CD “ staples of the region ’s climatic history , ” meaning “ strong Santa Ana winds ” and “ a drought that turned much of the hillsides to bone - dry kindling . ” " Neither can be attributed to NN NN , " VBD Westerling . The near blackout of skepticism on the networks did n’t come as much of a surprise , since reporters IN Pelley have been much more than onlookers in the NN of JJ warming . In JJ NNS they have become advocates – RB VBG “ to the ends of the NN ” “ to find evidence of NN NN . ” Ann Curry of NBC’s “ Today ” made that clear on Oct. 29 , 2007 : “ [ O ] ur mission , of course , is to find evidence of NN NN . ” When NNS with other views were mentioned , it sometimes came with a denigrating label IN “ deniers ” or “ cynics . ” Such critics were RB portrayed as JJ - earthers by journalists and guests . CD person skeptical of manmade NN NN , a Kentucky NN representative , managed to VB on the air but was treated to an exceptionally hostile interview by ABC ’s Bill Weir . There were JJ other flaws in the reporting that created a very CD - sided perspective . Journalists repeatedly phrased questions or made statements indicating JJ - caused warming was a fact , and they included opinions of politicians , movie stars , musicians and ordinary NNS IN bankers instead of relying on NNS . But according to Dr. Pat Michaels viewers MD be better served by hearing both sides . “ They MD benefit from appreciating the true scientific diversity on the topic . The arguments against these gloom and doom JJ warming scenarios are much stronger than the arguments for them , ” Michaels VBD BMI . According to NBC ’s Brian Williams , “ There ’s no shortage of folks out there saying it ’s [ JJ warming is ] not all that bad . ” Williams was teasing a “ Nightly NNP ” NN on August 15 that included CD other voices : Dr. Pat Michaels , a NN professor of JJ sciences , and Marlo Lewis , senior fellow at the Competitive Enterprise Institute . Williams was certainly JJ – there are hundreds of NNS from around the NN who question the JJ warming “ consensus ” – but in the NN the latter half of 2007 you had to look hard to find them . On the three networks , 80 percent of stories ( 167 out of 205 ) did n’t mention skepticism or anyone at all who dissented from JJ warming alarmism . CBS did the absolute worst job . Ninety - seven percent of its stories ( 34 out of 35 ) ignored other opinions . Williams ’ own network , NBC , came in a close second with 85 percent ( 76 out of 89 ) excluding skepticism . ABC was the most balanced network , but still censored dissent from 64 percent of its stories ( 34 out of 53 ) . But dissent flourishes . The U.S. Senate Environment and Public Works ( EPW ) Committee released a list on Dec. 20 , 2007 , of more than 400 skeptical NNS from different fields – astrophysics , geology , climatology , meteorology and others . The release did n’t RB earn a NN brief from CD of the three networks as of Dec. 31 , 2007 . RB when CD show claimed it MD represent a range of opinions on the issue , it did n’t . On Oct. 30 , 2007 , NBC “ Today ” co-host Matt Lauer teased the upcoming “ Ends of the NNP ” broadcasts saying to Meredith Vieira , “ And you ’re VBG to be interviewing all the experts talking about the issues of NN NN . ” ( emphasis added ) Vieira replied , “ Absolutely . Getting into a whole debate , too , because some NNS VBP there ’s an effect of NN NN , others say not really . So we ’re VBG to discuss all of it and give viewers at home real tips on what you can do . ” But on Nov. 5 and 6 , 2007 as “ Today ” went to the “ Ends of the NNP , ” the only “ experts ” Vieira spoke to were former vice NN Al Gore , Chip Giller of Grist.org – a left - wing JJ Web site – and Katherine Wroth , co-author of “ Wake Up and Smell the Planet . ” Grist is an extreme publication . David Roberts of the environmentalist magazine called for " war crimes trials for these bastards ¬– some sort of NN Nuremberg , " referring to the NN NN " denial industry . " ( Roberts later retracted his comment , but not until it received a strongly negative response . ) The only skepticism of JJ warming “ consensus ” that came up was a brief mention by Vieira as she interviewed Gore . She asked Gore about John Christy , CD scientist formerly with the NNP Nations ’ Intergovernmental Panel on NNP NNP ( IPCC ) , who criticized Gore ’s predictions in an op - ed printed in The Wall Street Journal . Gore shot RB calling Christy an “ outlier . ” Vieira did n’t question Gore ’s remark or give Christy an opportunity to respond to the attack . Perhaps if she had , Christy MD have echoed his remarks from the Nov. 1 , 2007 , Wall Street Journal : “ I VBP neither the developing catastrophe nor the smoking gun proving that JJ activity is to blame for most of the warming we VBP . Rather , I VBP a reliance on NN models ( useful but never ‘ proof ’ ) and the coincidence that NN in NN dioxide and JJ temperatures have loose similarity over NN , ” VBD Christy . He continued , “ We [ dissenting NNS ] discount the possibility that everything is caused by JJ actions , because everything we ’ve seen the NN do has happened before . NN levels rise and fall continually . The Arctic NN cap has shrunk before . CD millennium there are hippos swimming in the Thames , and a geological blink later there is an NN bridge linking Asia and North America . ” Journalists practically drooled over Al Gore during Live NNP interviews and after he won the Nobel Peace Prize . In contrast , NNS with alternative views barely got face NN on the networks . Instead , they received insults and hostile questions . The ugliest NN of a skeptic was by Bill Weir on Nov. 18 , 2007 , “ Good Morning America . ” He was interviewing Democratic NN representative Bill Gooch from Kentucky . Weir peppered Gooch with hardball questions and RB attacked Gooch ’s motives : Gooch made it clear that he supported an open debate , saying , “ [ T ] here is another side of the NN . I VBP what we have is we have the problem of JJ warming about to become a political problem when lawmakers in Congress , when governors in NNS , when RB the courts start to act in ways that are gonna affect the American NNS in severe ways . ” Gooch then mentioned the possible $ 6 - trillion cost of CD bill to deal with JJ warming . “ And what I wanna make sure that we do is that if we act , we have the NN JJ , ” explained Gooch . Weir was n’t satisfied : “ But , but according to all these NNS , the more handwringing we do , the more we dither on this , the worse it ’s VBG to VB . And what if you ’re wrong ? What if this is , in fact , a JJ catastrophe ? Is n’t it a moral imperative as a public servant to err on the side of planetary survival and VB something done ? ” Instead of letting Gooch debate with someone who disagreed , Weir filled that role himself . He came across as a passionate advocate for “ something ” that MD supposedly aid “ survival , ” ignoring the cost , accuracy , and his supposed objectivity . Journalists RB called skeptics “ deniers , ” conjuring images of Holocaust deniers , and cast them as JJ - earthers – ironically forgetting that there was once a scientific consensus that the NN was JJ . When Gore attacked Dr. Christy [ who was mentioned by Meredith Vieira ] on “ Today ” Nov. 5 , 2007 , Gore specifically compared NNS critical of anthropogenic ( JJ - caused ) JJ warming to NNS who VBP the NNP is JJ . “ Well , he ’s an outlier , he no longer belongs to the IPCC . And he is RB outside the scientific consensus … There are still NNS who VBP that the NNP is JJ , ” VBD Gore . Republican governor Arnold Schwarzenegger made the same disparaging comparison on July 16 , 2007 “ Early Show ” on CBS . After co-host Harry Smith VBD , “ [ I ] asked why some NNS still do n’t VB we have a problem . ” “ Well , I VBP that there is [ sic ] still a lot of NNS that still VBP that the NN is JJ , ” VBD Schwarzenegger . NBC ’s chief JJ affairs correspondent Anne Thompson VBD , " He is proudly a denier , " of NN professor and CATO senior fellow Dr. Pat Michaels . Michaels VBD BMI , “ She has no idea what she ’s talking about . I have written and spoken repeatedly in the last 15 NNS that JJ beings are responsible for most of the warming in the past century . ” What Michaels disagrees on is whether such warming will result in JJ catastrophe . Recalling that NBC interview , Michaels continued , “ The interview was great , but she pulled out CD little piece and took it completely out of context . It was really , really disappointing . The interview was conducted in a very professional fashion , it was the editing that clearly did not reflect the tone and content of the overall interview . ” Thompson actually included CD dissenting views in that Aug. 15 , 2007 , “ Nightly NN ” but undermined both their opinions by implying they were not experts and were only making trouble : “ NN experts say whether hired guns or honest dissenters , deniers are confusing the issue and delaying solutions . ” A paltry 37 NNS expressing skepticism were included in six months of TV NN coverage on the issue across three networks . That included all kinds of NNS IN politicians or NN employees , business representatives , celebrities , ordinary NNS and unidentified NNS . Only seven of them were NNS IN Michaels . CBS practically banned skeptics from its network , including only four and not a single scientist . The network seemed to adopt the mentality of CBS journalist Scott Pelley , who referred to JJ warming skeptics as “ deniers ” in March 2006 when he VBD , “ If I do an interview with [ Holocaust survivor ] Elie Wiesel , am I required as a journalist to find a Holocaust denier ? ” Recent “ 60 Minutes ” segments from Pelley indicated he has n’t changed his mind about balanced journalism . What those celebrities VBD had little to do with NN and everything to do with advocacy . Charlie Crist ( R ) , California Gov. Arnold Schwarzenegger ( R ) and NNP York City Mayor Michael Bloomberg ( Independent ) , among others . Drought has played only a minor role , and the main victims are poor townspeople , farmers and rural laborers . ” The ABC correspondent did n’t include any statements about the NN the war was thought to have contributed to the famine . text: A rapper - turned - JJ - Earther is attempting to prove that the NN is not round by crowdfunding his own satellite launch . B.o.B , born Bobby Ray Simmons Jr. , is a rapper from Georgia who once recorded a diss track about physicist Neil deGrasse Tyson , after the CD got into a NNP fight in 2016 about whether the NNP is round . The rapper is a member of the NNP NNP Society , a group of NNS who are convinced that the planet is JJ , not round . A scroll through B.o. B's NNP feed RB reveals a number of other NN beliefs : He is an anti-vaxxer , a 9/11 truther and RB , for some reason , believes that oil does not form from the remains of organic material buried under pressure . B.o.B's JJ GoFundMe has a $ 1 million goal and has raised $ 2,701 from 98 NNS in the five days since he put up the request . ( He pledged the JJ $ 1,000 himself . ) The goal , according to the rapper , is to launch a satellite as far into NN as necessary to " find the curve " of NNP . [ 7 Ways to Prove the NNP Is Round ( Without Launching a Satellite ) ] How we VBP the NNP is round Despite myths about Christopher Columbus believing he might sail off the edge of the NNP , humans have VBN that the NN is round for a very , very JJ NN . The Greek philosopher and mathematician Pythagoras left the JJ written arguments for a round NNP in 500 B.C. Ancient Greeks thought the sphere was the perfect shape , so it stood to reason , Pythagoras figured , that the NNP was spherical . A few hundred NNS later , according to the American Physical Society ( APS ) , Aristotle dropped some scientific evidence into the debate . He pointed out that during lunar eclipses , NNP 's shadow on the moon is curved ; ships VBG over the horizon seem to drop down , hull - RB , rather than becoming tinier and tinier until they disappear ; and different stars are visible from different vantage points on NNP , which MD n't make much sense if the planet were JJ . The Greek mathematician Eratosthenes , born in 276 B.C. , RB managed to determine the circumference of the NNP . He did this , according to the APS , by measuring the angle of the shadow of a stick stuck in the ground on the summer solstice in Alexandria , on what is today the Egyptian coast . He knew that in Aswan , Egypt ( then VBN as Syene ) , the sun cast no shadows on the day of the solstice — it was directly overhead . The difference in the sun 's angle between Syene and Alexandria corresponded to CD - fiftieth of a complete circle , so Eratosthenes realized that if he knew the exact distance between the CD cities , he 'd just need to multiply to determine the full circumference of the NNP . The mathematician had to hire surveyors to walk the distance with precisely measured steps , but he eventually landed on a total circumference for the planet of between 24,000 and 29,000 miles ( 39,000 to 47,000 kilometers ) . He turned out to be remarkably accurate : Around the equator , the planet 's circumference is 24,900 miles ( 40,072 km ) . So if the ancient Greeks had it figured out , how can anyone still VB in a JJ NNP in the age of satellites and rocket launches ? [ Top 10 NN Theories ] The resurgence of JJ - NNP beliefs started in the early 1800s with a writer named Samuel Rowbotham , who developed an entire alternative cosmology around the idea that the NNP is a JJ plane enclosed by a dome of NN , surrounded by a perimeter of NN walls . Rowbotham 's philosophy was that the NNP looks JJ , from a NN 's point of view walking on the NN , so everyone who VBD they MD show otherwise must be lying . The International NNP NNP Society , formed in 1956 , draws from Rowbotham 's views . In the mid-1990s , the NN of the group claimed to have 3,500 paying members , according to his NNP York Times obituary . Today , the NNP NNP Society website claims to have 555 members , the most recent being B.o.B . JJ - Earthers do n't trust NASA or any other NN agency . According to the NNP NNP Society 's FAQs , astronauts are being bribed or coerced into lying ; airplane windows distort views to make it look IN the horizon curves ; and the International NNP Station is a hoax . RB , gravity is n't real . An independent satellite launch MD or MD not convince B.o. B that the NNP really does curve , but he MD find the process a bit difficult if he does n't accept that the planet is round . To launch a satellite ( or any other object ) into NN , you have to take into account the NNP 's radius . In the formula for the speed needed to achieve orbit , V = sqrt ( g0 * Re ^ 2 / ( Re + h ) ) , " Re " is the mean planetary radius . Astronomer Johannes Kepler sorted this out in the 1600s , according to NASA . It remains to be seen whether B.o. B will ever VB a chance to launch a satellite , anyway . According to The Verge , GoFundMe has frozen the rapper 's donation account , meaning he wo n't be able to access the funds unless he can provide more NN that the money will not be mismanaged .

text: NNS who belief in the NNP NNP NNP hold the conviction that the NN is JJ and not round . This NN started to become more and more popular around 2009 and is growing ever since . It is considered CD of the most controversial NN theories existing . They claim the NNP to be JJ because for them it feels IN and looks IN it is . The ones believing in this NNP call themself “ The NNP NNP Society ” and the importance about this is that RB though there is evidence to the contrary they claim those “ to be fabrications of a ‘ round NNP NN ’ ” ( Wolchover ) . The believers in the NNP NNP NNP VBP that the “ NNP is a disc with the Arctic Circle in the center and Antarctica , a 150 - NN - tall wall of NN , around the rim . ” ( Wolchover ) . Believers claim that the NASA guards protect those NN walls from NNS that try to climb over and fall from the disc . In their eyes they RB VBP that NNP ’s gravity is an illusion and objects do not accelerate downward , they are “ driven up by a mysterious force called dark NN ” . On the opposite end , there are countless photographs , videos , and imagery from astronauts and from the International NNP Station that is enough evidence to show that the NNP is actually round , but the interesting part here is that RB though there is evidence that prove their claims wrong in their eyes it is not considered real evidence and faked by the NN . Those who VBP in it most likely misinterpret the evidence and are only looking for beliefs that MD confirm their owns . This is RB called confirmation bias . In this case they ignore the real evidence that the NN is round and label them as ‘ JJ ’ , whereas when something in any NN MD support their beliefs has to be correct . Another cognitive contribution is groupthink , which is a concept that NNS within a group “ value harmony and coherence above rational thinking ” ( PsychologyToday ) . This often results in dysfunctional outcomes and irrational beliefs . In this case , NNP NNP Society members do not VB to doubt or judge the others beliefs and therefore strengthen their owns . The JJ NNP model started in the ancient where JJ cultures believed in a JJ NNP “ until the classical the Bronze Age ” ( Wikipedia ) . It became more controversial again , because the moon landing in 1959 came with a lot of skepticism . JJ NN theorists VBP that the moon landing was JJ and the pictures and audios recorded from that NN were fabrications . They VBP that GPS devices and maps are JJ and that the International NNP Station is a JJ NN station , believing it MD be cheaper to promote a JJ station rather than build a real NN . The primary JJ influence that maintains their belief is groupthink . JJ reinforcement form IN - minded NNS allows them to feel sane when they speak of the topic and feel that their opinions are respected and justified . RB though this NN can be proven wrong by a lot of evidence , the JJ brain and different psychological concept show how PRP can persists with their beliefs due to groupthink or biases . JJ RB love searching for meaning and drawing connections between things that sometimes have no tangible connection between them . It is simply JJ nature .

text: With every interesting celestial event these days , Christian prophecy theorists take to NNP to share their speculation on why it's a " sign " and what it might just mean . But does NNP really communicate warnings this NN in the sun , moon and stars ? Does the Bible really instruct us to look for " signs " in the heavens ? What are we to " watch " for according to Jesus ? As you will learn , theorists ( unintentionally ) deceive themselves and others when they do n't properly define and use the word " sign " the same NN the Bible does . VB Scriptural answers to these important questions , ones that you wo n't find on NNP no matter how JJ " views " a NN has ... Since the Christian speculation over the " four NN moons " lunar eclipses of 2014 - 2015 failed and neither the Great Tribulation nor the Rapture happened as predicted , we 're still here . That means now we VBP to discuss similar speculation about the latest solar eclipse or celestial event . Are you ready ? Once again , it 's all thanks to NNP ... Yes , the same wonderful NNP that brings you : • any song or music NN from your childhood you VBP to experience again , • instructional videos to fix anything and everything in your NN , ... RB brings you theories that either were dismissed with the arrival of NNP or that are too obviously contrived to ever spread through other channels that cost money or by free channels that are limited to much - less - persuasive text ( IN the original Web 1.0 ) . Why do you VB JJ NNP NN is in a resurgence ? ( No , NASA did not develop a NN machine and bring RP medieval NNS and teach them to blog . ) It 's because free NN allows any " thought " ( using the term loosely ) to VB bolstered up by convincing charts , photos and the silver tongues of persuasive on - screen personalities . JJ - earther Christians began emailing me in early 2015 RB after a now popular NNP NN on the topic was posted : • 2015 , JJ JJ - earther to write me : " I have n't seen you write about the E yet , which by the NN , fits RB better with bible teachings . " • 2016 , same person after writing a JJ NNP article for him : " Please cancel ALL emails to me . You are a and obviously have spent no NN on researching the JJ NNP . " Likewise , because of NNP , prophetic speculation is spreading about the latest interesting eclipse . It 's RB popular enough to break into mainstream NN just IN the 2014 - 2015 speculation did . I say " interesting " eclipse because there are several eclipses ( lunar or solar ) every NN that are simply ignored by our helpful NNP " watchmen . " Unless a celestial event has something extra ( IN taking place on Jewish holy days or happening seven NNS away from something else interesting ) then you wo n't VB a prophecy NN on it . Eclipses are far too common to form the basis of a prophecy NN every single NN they happen . But the 2017 solar eclipse is an interesting NN . Here are some of the factoids talked about this eclipse — along with my responses to VB you VB about them more critically yourself : • Claim : " The next total solar eclipse in America is in seven NNS and forms an X when combined with this eclipse . These eclipses MD be marking out the seven NN Tribulation ! " Response : Where does the Bible say to look for eclipses to mark the Tribulation ? Nowhere . What does it tell us to expect RB ? Jesus already VBD , " when you VBP the Abomination of Desolation " the Great Tribulation is next ( Mt 24:15 ) . Further , the seven - NN - JJ 70th Week of Daniel cannot start this NN as numerous prerequisites have not happened , IN the Nuclear Middle East War , Elijah 's coming , and most importantly the Good NNP of the Kingdom returning ( Mt 24:14 ) ( more on that below ) . • Claim : " The solar eclipse happens the day before the start of the Hebrew month of Elul . " Response : " Day before " is kind of random and arbitrary . MD n't the eclipse need to happen on Elul 1 itself if you VBP to connect it to the past historical prophetic events of that day ? That 's what was done in 2014 - 2015 with eclipses on the very days of Passover and Sukkot by Mark Biltz . This NN Mr. Biltz is happy enough with " the day before " to make a connection . This is a logical fallacy called " moving the goal posts . " • Claim : " Jonah left for Nineveh on the day of Elul 1 after there was a major solar eclipse in Nineveh the month before . " Response : VB above that the eclipse is not on the day of Elul 1 , so to be consistent , you must throw out any connection to Elul . As for " the month before " claim ( generously granting that the dating of this ancient event is reliable ) , why MD the Ninevites connect Jonah 's arrival with an eclipse an entire month before ? To reasonably expect NNS to connect an eclipse to something , that something needs to happen at the same NN , such as JJ as Jonah arrived and started warning . Again , moving goal posts . ( For a great depiction of something IN this , VB Mel Gibson 's movie Apocalypto and how a solar eclipse causes the pagans to VB plans immediately . ) • Claim : " The solar eclipse is 40 days from Yom Kippur " Response : Actually , it 's 41 days before Yom Kippur because it comes the day before Elul 1 which itself always starts the " 40 days of awe / repentance " before Yom Kippur , yes ? But RB if it was 40 days , so what ? Elul 1 comes every NN without event . Eclipses come every NN without event . Nothing in Scripture connects general eclipses with prophecy . • Claim : " NNP War 1 started in August , 1914 the same month there was a total solar eclipse over the Ottoman Empire ( E. Europe ) which ended with WW1 . " Response : Why is " same month " significant ? As stated above , it 's tenuous at best to connect an eclipse to any event that is not concurrent . Further , there have been half a dozen total solar eclipses in Europe since WW1 , so why have we not had WW3 - WW7 already ? Because this WW1 eclipse claim comes from another logical fallacy called cherry - picking data . • Claim : " The last NN an eclipse crossed only the NNP NNPS was during WW1 on August 21 , 1914 " Response : I guess the implication here is that " trouble " is coming again this NN ? If this is how it works based on WW1 , what happened to the total solar eclipse across the continent before WW2 ?? I guess there 's not much of a pattern here when you include all the data but instead just draw a circle around the data that fits your NN , RB called the Texas Sharpshooter fallacy . • Claim : " The path of the solar eclipse passes over counties that 95 % voted for NNP " Response : What , you mean NNP is using the Sun to highlight his approval of NNP ? Albeit only 95 % approval ... haha . I thought he was the Messiah , er , Cyrus LOL . ( I am not against NNP per se , just some NNS take their adoration of him too far , in my opinion . ) • Claim : " The path of the solar eclipse passes over SEVEN towns called Salem ! " Response : What , you mean NNP is using the Sun to highlight his approval of NNP ? Albeit only 95 % approval ... haha . I thought he was the Messiah , There are JJ , JJ more claims than this about the eclipse because , just IN with the 2012 Mayan Calendar speculation , as more NNS hear the idea , they perceive more connections of their own that spawn more NNP videos . The above most frequently repeated claims are enough to VB how arbitrary and subjective the " evidence " is for this eclipse being prophetically significant . Q : " What are the odds ? It ca n't be just a coincidence ! " A : No it 's not a coincidence but the odds are not as great as you VBP when you understand what it really is ! As the section above illustrated , the " connections " that are made to support the " significance " of the eclipse or other event use inconsistent rules . In other words , they use inconsistent rules and logic to connect whatever they can remember or imagine or Google that MD impress NNS . • If the event falls same day as a Biblical holy day ... bingo ! • If it comes the day before a biblical date ... close enough , bingo ! • If it comes the same month as something else big ... bingo ! • If it comes seven NNS before something ... bingo ! Obviously , when you employ flexible , moving goalposts or " rules " IN this , you are able to find interesting factoids for any event or date you VBP is significant . This is what happened with the 2012 Mayan Calendar date , and the 2014 - 2015 Four NNP Moons NN and we VBP how these turned out despite the claim , " the odds of all these connections are astronomical ! This happens not because of legitimate coincides but rather due to a JJ psychological bias called Confirmation Bias . This bias causes us to ignore or reject evidence against our NN and accept and report all the evidence for it . RB when NNS present evidence against our NN ( IN this article ! ) their bias will use flexible rules and other moving goalposts to reject the evidence against it . For example , here 's another claim about the 2017 total solar eclipse regarding the name Salem : Seven towns named Salem . So what , JJ ? But wait , they VBD a verse to tie it to the eclipse . Drum roll again , please ... Look at that , will you , the word Salem is last part of the word Jerusalem and it's connected to an eclipse ! " What are the odds ? " The odds are very high indeed when you can " cheat " by matching any aspect of an eclipse to any part of any word in the Bible RB remotely related to an eclipse . Contrivances IN this only demonstrate the imagination and NN genius of the prophecy theorist to justify their event as important . They do n't provide any real Biblical proof that the event is prophetically significant . By the NN , real Biblical evidence for an event 's prophetic significance MD be along the lines of a direct quote from Jesus . IN him saying , " When you VBP X , then the end shall come . " Turns out Jesus VBD something exactly IN that , but not about an eclipse ! ( More below . ) Prophecy theories IN this are not just based on specific claims about a particular eclipse or other celestial event . The theorists RB quote numerous Biblical passages to justify their unusual focus on heavenly events in the JJ place . ( Again , VB the film Apocalypto for a reminder of how the pagans viewed eclipses . You MD say Christians fearing eclipses again today is " retro " but in a negative NN , much IN JJ NNP NN is retro . P.S. No judgment on the NNS , just the ideas they VBP and , too often , beat other believers up over . ) For an example of the " heavenly " focus verses they employ , look at this partial transcription of a " biblical astronomy " NNP NN and VB if you can spot any problems with the reasoning before I point them out : Sounds reasonable , does n't it ? At least to most JJ to prophecy NN . It 's persuasive enough for JJ of them to hit the share button and send it to others to VB warn them or ask their opinion . ( I VBP for me I only ever watch a prophecy teaching on NNP because someone shared it to ask my opinion of it . ) The transcript above leads to a false conclusion to justify looking to the heavens for NNP 's direction such as with eclipses . Here 's the problems with the arguments above : • Psalm CD tells us the heavens declare something , and it's a pretty broad concept at that : " NNP 's glory . " It uses a lot of poetic language ( IN anthropomorphism ) to emphasize this . But there is no literal speech or language or communication on that level from the sky . There is enough expanse there for humanity to realize NNP exists and to be " without excuse " in denying this fact and disobeying him as Paul VBD ( Rom 1:20 ) . That 's it for the normal , daily basis that the psalm is commenting on ( with CD rare exceptions , VB 3 below ) . • Because of this , the heavens cannot ever serve as a NN for NNP to " speak " intelligibly to his NNS . For nearly all of us , NN is just a random bunch of balls of light with different names , sizes and illumination levels . A few of these balls have vague or general historical meanings IN the Signs of the Zodiac do . What it means when they light up or crisscross is anybody 's guess , and guess away they do ! This is why there are a million and CD subjective opinions on " what the eclipse means " shared by prophecy theorists . • The Bible already answers the question posed on how NNP has and will speak " to all his NNS " when the need comes to do that : through his end NN prophet Elijah and lastly through seven literal thundering shouts of his voice ( Ps 29:3 = Rev 10:4 ) RB before he brings his Kingdom to NNP at the 7th trumpet ( Rev 11:15 ) . Oh , NNP can speak to all his NNS at once with clear , JJ language when he wants to . He did this with all of ancient Israel at Mount Sinai and they consequently asked him to " please , stop " out of fear ( Ex 20:19 ) . As you can tell , apart from NNP 's greatness , the heavens do not communicate much at all very clearly to us humans . This is why NNP uses several other much better means to talk to humanity . As noted above , all these means use actual , real , JJ language . If NNP spoke in a NN any less clear than that , no NN MD be held accountable to act on his instructions or warnings . They MD rightly claim they did not understand because his " heavenly lights language " was incomprehensible . But what about all those " sign " verses ? Does n't sign mean a message as with a " For Sale " " sign ? " Does n't NNP use the lights in the heavens to at least send simple informational warnings of end times events ? Not quite . Let 's look at the common verses that are used to justify drawing attention to eclipses and other heavenly displays . The thrust of Genesis 1:14 is that the heavenly lights MD signal common divisions of NN : " seasons , days and NNS . " In the Bible , the month is based on the moon ; months begin with the JJ ( crescent ) moon . Days begin when the sun sets or disappears . Stars in the sky VBP based on the season you are in . NNS RB can be marked by the solstices , or shortest or longest days of the NN . That 's what Genesis in context means by letting them be all things dealing with the calendar . It VBZ nothing about " let them be for prophetic warning signs from NNP " IN prophecy theorists wrongly wield ( proof - text ) the verse to mean . In both of these passages the word for sign MD RB be translated as " miracle , " " token " or " wonder . " Notice that none of those words convey the idea of " communication / speech / warning " as is portrayed by prophecy theorists . The point of the word is that there is a attention - catching display in the sky . It 's called a " wonder " because it makes NNS " wonder " due to it being unclear and hard to explain . Further , if you read Luke 21:25 in context , you do not find instructions to look for this sign to mean anything . It comes at the end of NNP 's wrath , RB before the Jesus appears . It 's certainly proper to have a nice heavenly fanfare before his triumphant return . By then we 'll already VB the day he 's coming . Revelation 12 goes on to explain the meaning of the great signs of the Woman and the Dragon . The Dragon is the constellation Draco and RB Satan . The Woman RB works at JJ levels including the constellation Virgo , Mary and saints of Israel and of the Church . It shows plainly that the Woman gives birth to the Messiah who later is " taken up " to heaven ( Acts 1:9 = Rev 12:5 ) . There is no connection in any NN given between the Woman in heaven and the end times events . Later after she is VBN on the NN fleeing from the Dragon , she is indeed an end NN character , too . The sign in the sky she portrayed earlier is never connected to her end NN actions and existence . When NNS make such a connection they read into the text what is not there , ignoring what is there as they did connecting September 23 , 2017 with Revelation 12 . As the previous section explained , when you look at the " signs " verses in context , they do not support the meaning for which they are used by Christian prophecy inventors . Each verse refers to a specific instance and application , such as calendar signs and the the sign on the day Jesus returns . They are not meant to give " carte blanche " or a blank check to justify " scanning the heavens for any sign " IN Christian theorists do . All that was obvious to me RB ago and I have written on it before . Thinking deeper on this topic , I began I VBP another problem . The meaning of the word translated " sign " in our English Bible versions does not support the definition that prophecy theorists use it for . Sign , IN JJ words , has several valid , possible literal meanings and connotations . A sign can have a short message in it IN a billboard or " For Sale " sign does ( " $ 1000 call 555-1212 " ) . Or a sign can mean something as limited as a signal light to indicate your engine is malfunctioning or that the day is over IN a sunset does . Which NN is the Bible intending ? Let 's clear up that confusion on the JJ definition of the English word " sign " to use : • Prophecy Theorists : Sign = " communication or message from NNP " much IN a " billboard " or " NNP 's day timer " ( to borrow from the title of Mark Biltz 's book where he teaches watching for heavenly signs on NNP 's calendar among other things ) . • The Bible : Sign = " wonder , display , token , signal " again , much IN a sunset or a car 's dashboard engine warning light . Here 's what the problem is with prophecy theorists ' portrayal of celestial " signs " with their limited and specific meanings in their context : It 's UH when our car 's designated engine warning light goes off and we decide it means we need to call our mom because she misses us . In other words , we reject the simple , limited , contextual meaning of the sign and expand it to be not just something else from left field , but a complete communication IN " Aww ... Mom misses me . I need to call her . " Meanwhile , all the engine light indicates is something quite vague and limited : something is wrong with the engine ! The final nail in the coffin of the approach of the prophecy theorists is that as they VBP about inventing JJ end NN signs based on NASA charts and historical factoids , they completely ignore the CD precursor end NN sign that Jesus gave us . That sign is VBN hidden away in a single , puzzling verse in the middle of the Olivet Discourse : " This " gospel of the Kingdom ? " Which NN was that again ? " Exactly ! Until 2016 I did not VB the answer to that , either . It had me stumped , too . It 's not our fault . Christianity does not teach any such " this gospel of the Kingdom " or we MD not respond with blank stares when asking what it is . Christianity certainly teaches " good NN about Jesus " just not the good NN of Jesus , you VBP , the NN that he taught on the rewards NNP gives NNS now who seek the coming Kingdom and NNP 's righteousness ( Mt 6:33 ) . VBG further , if Christianity did teach the Good NNP of Jesus already , Jesus MD not indicate it as an end NN sign . We 'd somehow have to VB exactly when it reaches " all nations , " which PRP can never VB for sure or easily . But if the Good NN message of the Kingdom died out with Jesus and the apostles , then when it reappears on the NNP in our NN , we then have a distinct clear and recognizable , unprecedented - in - 2000 - NNS sign . It will be so amazing that the worldwide spread of it in this JJ NN / NNP age is ensured . You wo n't be able to miss it . If you VBP to understand this important topic fully now , VB the NN in my supporters section . Finally , Here 's The Real Role of Eclipses In End NN Prophecy ! By the NN , the Good NNP of the Kingdom message will contain a built - in extra reason to " obey it " ( 2Th 1:8 ) . I 'm referring to the warning on end NN events . In our NN , you do n't just need to repent to be saved , but RB to follow NNP 's end NN escape instructions to survive what 's coming . Here 's the kicker . Interestingly enough , CD of JJ events of the end NN " beginning of sorrows " ( perhaps simultaneous with an earthquake or directly follow it ) that Jesus warned about affecting the whole NNP is ... But not just any eclipse . In fact , it 's VBG to be a weird combined , simultaneous solar and lunar eclipse : Joel and Revelation both agree that , somehow , both the sun and moon will be eclipsed at the same NN . Of course that is impossible today and I doubt most ( if any ) on NNP will be able to witness both . For a typical lunar eclipse , the sun and moon must be on opposite sides of the NNP . A solar eclipse at the same NN MD require another celestial NN to be very near to NNP in order to block the sun . Or perhaps the object blocks the sun for both the moon and NNP ... However exactly it happens , such a JJ foreign NN is identified by Revelation later ( and only after analyzing it 's JJ literal clues ) as a dwarf planet it calls Wormwood ( Rev 8:10 - 11 ; Note that the Greek word aster translated " star " is not specific to a star but can mean among other things planets of various sizes ) . Notice RB in context that RB this unprecedented combination lunar and solar eclipse does not happen as an isolated incident . A great earthquake , so great that it shifts the NNP 's entire topography significantly , RB occurs with it . Not to mention so JJ shooting stars that the normal starry night sky scrolls away . How is this possible ? The dwarf planet Wormwood is broken up at NNP 's Roche Limit and partially disintegrates . It can then literally " fall from heaven " upon the NNP ( Rev 8:10 ) . It 's dispersed slowly enough in small enough chunks to not end all NN on NNP RB then and there . Now is it a " sign ? " Revelation does not use that word but again , in the JJ meaning of the word sign , you MD say among the JJ " signs " of Wormwood is a unique double eclipse . But we 'll already VB it 's coming because of Elijah ( and already be in safety in Judea as Psalm 91 depicts ) . So in CD NN it is but the NN theorists look to eclipses to tell them the end ahead of NN , it 's definitely not . Seeing this all in context , can you understand how incorrect it is for prophecy theorists to quote those verses above to support their attention to isolated eclipses ( RB if four similar ones happen in a row ) IN they did in 2014 - 2015 ? Can you understand how it 's the same as seeing the dashboard engine indicator light VB on , ignoring its " check engine " - label context and deciding it means something completely different outside the car ? If you feel IN you 're done with NNP prophecy videos and ready to understand end NN prophecy literally , comprehensively and in context , including all the details on Wormwood ( 3rd trumpet ) and the rest of the seven seals , seven trumpets and seven bowls , order my book VB the Future and begin reading ( the bonus eBook version ) instantly while the softcover version makes its NN to you printed and shipped by Amazon 's CreateSpace in South Carolina . You 'll be directly blessing yourself and others by supporting my further writing on this site . Thank you .

text: The three largest Western NNS , America , Canada , Australia and Europe maintain the most responsible birth rates in the NN . The citizens of those NNS practice birth NN , which brought their birth rates down to 2.0 or less in the past 45 NNS . While Western thinking and intelligent action created stable societies , the rest of the NN roared ahead by adding 3.5 billion in those 45 NNS and continues with 80 million , net gain , annually , or 1 billion added every 12 NNS . And , no end in sight as humans VBP a projected 3.1 billion more within 36 NNS by 2050 .  Most Western elites continue urging the wealthy West not to stem the migrant tide [ that adds 80 million net gain annually to the planet ] , but to absorb our JJ brothers and sisters until their horrid ordeal has been endured and shared by allten billion humans packed onto an ecologically devastated planet . Dr. Otis Graham , Unguarded Gates Annually , 18 million starve to death and at least 2 billion live within the human misery index of daily NN and food scarcity . Notwithstanding , they keep reproducing without end , means or understanding . Those folks continue adding 80 million annually , so , in order to save themselves , they export endless millions of their numbers into stable Western NNS who chose 2.0 birth rates . In the meantime , not CD NN leader addresses it . Not CD Western leader touches the subject . Immigration remains the last taboo RB up there with the  NNP is flat ;  Adam and Eve constitute the JJ humans ;  the Bible is the final say ;  The sun and universe rotates around the Earth as spoken by the Pope ; and finally , lets not deal with global NN change or the fact that we face complete  Peak Oil NN exhaustion within 40 NNS . If we ignore it , the whole mess will VB away . Answer : not on your NN ! Some of us deal with immigration because it not only adds to Canada , America , Europe and Australias final horrific population expansions the added numbers from the Third NNP , when they reach the NNP NNP , they begin to quintuple their use of resources thus magnifying the NN footprint , NN footprint , resource footprint and NN footprint . Not by a little , but by an exponential growth factor second to none . Therefore , immigration into the West creates a nightmare . What might that nightmare mean ? It means the Third NNP keeps using the NNP NNP for a JJ exhaust vent . In the end , the West ultimately faces duplicating the Third NNP in overpopulation and resource usage . It wont be pretty folks . A reader responded to my last missive ,  Once again , someone claims that any focus on immigration to the NNP NNPS is a meaningless distraction . In effect , he - she is saying that the annual addition of more than 30 million consumers to the third most populous and industrialized nation on NN is irrelevant . Moreover , since all nations and all JJ citizens will be subject to an NN contraction , building walls will not insulate us from that impact .  This stance is not credible . If NN deliveries will contract , it is ever more imperative to contract the number of consumers in America , or at the very least , prevent the US population from growing . Each additional American citizen will reduce the per capita share of non-renewable resources . We MD not be able to solve the NN crisis , but surely we can't stand by and allow that crisis to be accelerated by an indifference to immigration growth .  He or she hopes to reduce population levels by a grassroots approach , by building a " belief consensus " for population reduction among target groups , IN " grandmothers " who are not in the breeding phase of NN . But how do you sell birth NN to NNS who look around and VBP their own communities bulge with immigrants , legal and illegal ? How do you tell the Smiths and the Jones ' that they should not have NNS when the Sanchez family down the block is having five ?  As CD of my critics VBD me , governments are determined to grow the population by CD means or another . If citizens choose not to birth NNS at a replacement level , then governments will import them . " I prefer to have my own NNS than to outsource that job to immigrants " , she VBD . This is a natural reaction . If you do n't reduce immigration , you can't convince NNS to remain childless in the interest of population NN .  BTW , regarding target audiences . Have you ever met a grandmother or grandfather who was n't absolutely delighted at the prospect of having a grandchild ?  Let 's VB real . Controlling migration is the most efficient method of controlling or reducing population growth . " But how does that affect population levels ?  he or she asked . The answer is that open borders are a proven fertility stimulant to those NNS , which rely on massive emigration to relieve their population pressures and gain remittance money . The Philippines and Haiti are a case in point . Migration promotes JJ population growth . Fellow humans , this writer puts it into logical perspective . We cannot and will not survive our current path . I guarantee it . We better move this issue to the top of the national conversation . We must strive to write , speak and multiply our numbers and message . To argue or dialectic the issue endlessly and fruitlessly among ourselves gets us nowhere . I have given you the top addresses of all the top NN in the past . Use them , write them , call them , speak to them , agitate to them and maintain your tenacity with your relentless enthusiasm . You are the Thomas Paines , George Washingtons , Ben Franklins , Thomas Jeffersons , Abigail Adams , Joyce Tarnows , Dr. Diana Hulls , Dr. Albert Bartletts , Susan B. Anthonys , Jo Widemans , Dr. John Tantons , Madeline Welds , Jenny Goldies , Tim Murrays , Eric Rimmers , Brian McGavins , Mark OConnors , Marylou Tantons and Abe Lincolns of the 21 This is your watch , so move out and VB history toward a viable planet for your NNS .

text: Test Your Knowledge - and learn some interesting things along the NN . The description of " lobscouse " in our second example sounds anything but appetizing , but some version of this dish has been around for at least 300 NNS and it is a specialty of Liverpool , England . ( " Lobscouse " is RB called " scouse , " and Liverpudlians are sometimes referred to as " Scousers . " ) The origin of " lobscouse " is not VBN for certain . Although it 's been suggested that the JJ syllable of the word comes from an English dialect word " lob " meaning " to boil , " the more popular NN is that " lobscouse " comes from a Norwegian stew called " Lapskaus . " Tucked away in a box in the attic were old recipes from Grandpa 's father , including CD for lobscouse . " Mam knows that I do n’t VB lobscouse . All those bits of grey meat and white bone and potato and carrot in watery stock with globules of grease floating on top . It reminds me of washing - up NN and I ca n’t eat any of it . " -- From Mari Strachan 's 2009 novel , The NNP Hums in B NNP

text: • Stephen Curry raised eyebrows this week when he VBD on a podcast that he did n't VB in the moon landing . • ESPN's Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon , hosts of " Pardon the Interruption , " criticized Curry and some fellow ESPN co-workers who sided with Curry . They RB criticized Kyrie Irving , who previously VBD he believed the NNP is JJ . • Wilbon VBD the comments implied that all history MD be doubted , while Kornheiser called the comments embarrassing . ESPN's " Pardon the Interruption " hosts Michael Wilbon and Tony Kornheiser blasted Stephen Curry and some of their fellow co-workers over Curry 's recent comments about the moon - landing . On Monday , Curry VBD on The Ringer 's " Winging It " podcast that he does n't VB NASA landed on the moon . Fellow NBA players Andre Iguodala , Vince Carter , and Kent Bazemore , who were RB featured on the podcast , agreed . Though Curry did n't elaborate much further , the comments made the rounds , with NASA eventually inviting Curry to their facilities to VB moon rocks . On Tuesday 's " Pardon the Interruption , " Wilbon criticized Curry , as well as the ESPN analyst Jalen Rose and the NBA reporter Marc J. Spears — both of whom apparently agreed with Curry — saying the comments are harmful and can lead to NNS questioning history . " Do n't do this . Do n't come out and say , ' These pictures are kinda grainy . They 're black and white . Happened before I was born , ' " Wilbon VBD . " Because does that mean you do n't VB in slavery ? You do n't VB in the Revolutionary War ? ... Do n't do this . You guys are too smart . " Wilbon added : " If you are as woke as you say , you are as technologically savvy as you appear to be , do n't do this . Because you 're saying , ' I do n't VB in history . ' " " It 's a very small step to becoming a Holocaust denier or a slavery denier , " Kornheiser VBD . Kornheiser echoed Wilbon 's statements , RB naming Boston Celtics guard Kyrie Irving , who once VBD he believes the NNP is JJ . Kornheiser called Curry and Irving 's comments embarrassing to their families , schools , and to the NBA . " This is anti-intellectual and it's anti-science , " Kornheiser VBD . " It should embarrass you , it should embarrass your families , it should embarrass the fine schools you went to — Davidson and Duke , in the same NN . It should embarrass the NBA . It 's not a position to take . " It remains unclear if Curry was joking or not . Irving later rescinded his comments and apologized .

In the summer of 2018 she headed out onto the NN fields near Juneau , along with her mentor , Columbia NN scientist Jonny Kingslake , as part of the Juneau Icefield NNP Program , or JIRP . She brought her trusty recorder and sent RB audio . She mentions Seth Campbell , he’s at the NNP of Maine and is the director of JIRP . She RB brings up Bradley Markle , who ’s a postdoc at Caltech , and Wilson Clayton , formerly an JJ engineer and visiting faculty member at JIRP . Here ’s part 1 of her NN of doing NN on the NN ... on the NN . REST OF PART 1 And this past week , just before she headed out onto the NN again , I spoke to Elizabeth Case about last NN and the plans for this trip . That ’s it for this episode . text: Australia does n’t exist . The signs were there the whole NN : in what country is the only thing more poisonous than the snakes the spiders ? How did we ever VB that kangaroos were a thing ? This discovery , believed by some to be a joke or a NN NN , has been circulating on JJ NN in recent weeks after being formulated on Reddit in early 2017 . Except it turns out not to be the only NN of its kind : through the NNS , online sleuths have VBN that all sorts of places do n’t exist . High on the list is Finland , the country some VBP lies between Russia and Sweden , and that allegedly fought a valiant rearguard action against Soviet invasion in the runup to the second NN war . This NN was RB born on Reddit , in 2015 . Finland , the user Raregan explained , was merely a fictional creation designed to create fishing quotas to aid the export of sushi to Japan from Russia . Last summer , another Reddit user suggested the Italian region of Molise – population 300,000 – does n’t exist , apparently as the result of an Italian in - joke , while Brazilians have had for at least five NNS an online NN that the north - western NN of Acre does n’t exist or else is a land that NN forgot , still populated by dinosaurs . The joke – or painstakingly well - evidenced and argued NN – that a country or region does n’t exist turns out to be CD of the oldest memes on the internet . As early as 1993 , German users of Usenet – a network of online discussion forms ( or bulletin boards ) , which predates the web – had a running joke that the Westfalian town of Bielefeld ( population 300,000 , funnily enough ) was a fiction maintained by the CIA , Mossad , aliens or some combination of the three . The joke has crossed decades , online platforms , language barriers and international cultures , and keeps coming RB . “ The beauty of memes is that they are malleable and everyone can have their own spin on things and VB involved in the joke , ” VBZ writer Mollie Goodfellow . “ I VBP it VBZ that we all VBP to be in on the joke , especially online , where often different cliques and subgroups can form . ” In these days of JJ NN and mainstream - NN conspiracies , though , it does n’t do to take anything for granted – so G2 contacted a diplomatic source , who agreed to speak off the record and confirm what they MD about the existence ( or otherwise ) of Finland and Australia . “ Hang on , let me look out the window , ” the source replied , before confirming Finland existed . The source was unable to provide similar confirmation for Australia .

text: JJ distancing and early testing MD have PREVENTED 95 % of all NN NNS in China Authorities all over the NN are encouraging JJ distancing as a means to stop the spread of the highly contagious NN ( NNP - CD ) NN . Now , CD separate studies show how the NN MD have been slowed down when it broke out in China if JJ distancing practices were implemented earlier . To VB how governments can better respond to the NN , CD separate studies have taken a look at how China initially handled it . Both indicate that the number of infections MD have been much lower — by as much as 95 percent according to CD of the studies — had the country implemented JJ distancing earlier as asymptomatic carriers pose a much more significant NN . As the source of the NN - CoV2 NN responsible for the outbreak , it RB has the largest number of confirmed NNS at over 81,000 at the NN of writing . In CD of the studies , however , researchers estimated that the numbers MD have been as high as 114,325 by the end of February . Early detection and isolation more effective than travel restrictions To take a closer look at how effective China ’s containment strategy was and how it MD have been better , a team at the NNP of Southampton in England built a travel network - based susceptible - exposed - infections - removed ( SEIR ) model to simulate the outbreak across cities in mainland China . The model was then combined with historical and real - real - NN JJ movement data from location - based services run by Chinese tech NN Baidu . Using the simulation , the team gauged the effectivity of the various non-pharmaceutical intervention ( NPI ) strategies used by China , such as quarantines and JJ distancing . Here , the team figured that , without the NPIs , there MD have been a 67 percent increase in the number of NNS . However , the NN RB VBD that had China implemented these measures CD , CD or three weeks earlier , it MD have reduced the number of infections 66 , 86 and 95 percent , respectively . This is on top of reducing the number of areas affected by the outbreak . What ’s more interesting is that the researchers RB looked at the effectivity of the individual NPIs . Of the various methods , it was early detection and isolation of NNS that proved to be more effective . This finding is in line with what ’s happening in China ’s close neighbor South Korea , which has largely kept its outbreak under NN , thanks to a massive testing spree but no travel lockdown . That VBN , the team is n’t downplaying the effects of China ’s lockdowns on its cities . The team stated that a strategy of coordinated NPIs has the strongest and most rapid containment of the outbreak . “ Our NN demonstrates how important it is for NNS which are facing an imminent outbreak to proactively plan a coordinated response which swiftly tackles the spread of the NN on a number of fronts , ” added Dr. Shengjie Lai , a NN fellow at the NNP of Southampton and CD of the authors of the NN . The results of the NN at the NNP of Southampton line up with those of another NN recently published in the journal NNP . This NN focused on undocumented NNS of NN - CD in China and how they helped spread the infection before the authorities MD contain it . These undocumented NNS consisted of NNS who either had only mild NNS of the NN or no NNS at all . According to researchers at the Columbia NNP Mailman School of Public NNP who conducted the NN , these NNS can expose a far greater portion of the population to the NN than MD otherwise occur . To asses the full epidemic potential of the NN , the team used a computer model to estimate the proportion and contagiousness of these undocumented NNS during the weeks before and after China ’s lockdown of the city of Wuhan . In this model , the spread of the NN across cities was then simulated using the mobility data collected by Chinese form Tencent from January 10 to 23 and January 24 to February 8 . Using the numbers extrapolated from the model , the researchers at Columbia VBD that 86 percent of all infections were undocumented before travel in and out of Wuhan was shut down on January 23 . The researchers say that these undocumented infections were more than half as contagious as documented infections . However , they were still the source for over CD - thirds of the documented infections . “ The explosion of NN - CD NNS in China was largely driven by individuals with mild , limited , or no NNS who went undetected , ” stated co-author Jeffrey Shaman , professor of JJ NN sciences at Columbia NNP Mailman School . “ These stealth transmissions will continue to present a major challenge to the containment of this outbreak VBG forward , ” Shaman added . In late January , China implemented a number of measures to stop the spread of the NN , including implementing lockdowns of cities such as Wuhan . The researchers acknowledged that these , alongside the public ’s heightened awareness of the outbreak and increased use of personal protective measures , have helped slow the outbreak down . NN MD become endemic , and return IN seasonal NN Despite the measures implemented by China , the number of undocumented NNS and their effectivity at spreading the NN has made the researchers question whether or not efforts by the Chinese NN MD be enough to contain the spread of the NN entirely . Shaman VBD that he felt it was unclear whether the reductions made by China ’s efforts MD be enough to fully stem the spread of the NN . He then likened the ongoing NN to the 2009 H1N1 influenza NN . RB VBN as the “ swine NN , ” the Centers for NNP NNP and Prevention ( CDC ) estimated this NN killed around 284,500 NNS . Shaman then stated that the NNP - CD NN , which has only killed 3,213 as of the NN of writing , MD end up following the pattern of the swine NN NN , which MD make it the fifth endemic NN in humans . The four current endemic coronaviruses , including the CD responsible for the 2003 to 2004 NNP outbreak , are currently responsible for an estimated CD - quarter of all colds . If this JJ NN does join them as the fifth , then NNP - CD MD repeatedly return IN the seasonal NN . “ This is VBG to be with us for some NN – it ’s endemic in JJ populations and not VBG to VB away without a NN , ” VBD Amesh Adalja , an infectious - NN expert at the Johns Hopkins Center for NNP Security , earlier this month . Adalja RB warned that the early spread of the NN in the U.S. MD have been facilitated by it being mistaken as seasonal NN , resulting in NNS not getting tested . With the JJ studies then , the NNS are hoping that the mistakes in China are n’t continued in other NNS and that the early , undocumented spread of the NN is arrested through early testing and JJ distancing . That , and if the NN ever returns seasonally in the future , NN officials are better prepared to deal with it .
